title: Simba "fake bird's nest" public interest litigation case opened, with five controversial focuses
body:
With the help of the first case of public interest litigation with live goods, we may partially clarify the behavior boundary, rights and responsibilities of the relevant subjects of this emerging business format.

(edited by fan Rui and Zhu Ying)

On May 9, the consumer civil public interest litigation case filed by Henan Consumer Association (hereinafter referred to as “Henan Consumer Association”) on the “Simba live instant bird’s nest” incident officially opened, and Zhengzhou intermediate people’s Court (hereinafter referred to as “Zhengzhou intermediate court”) organized the trial online.

The Henan consumers’ Association filed a lawsuit that Kwai, Simba and other parties jointly undertake the responsibility of “one refund and three compensation”, refund the total sales price of the bird’s nest involved in the case of RMB 1992.9 million, and impose a punitive compensation of three times the total sales price. The total amount of refunded compensation was nearly 80million yuan, and the Simba Kwai account number was permanently closed.

On May 11, the relevant person in charge of Henan Consumer Association declined the interview with e-Law of Finance and economics. The relevant person in charge of Simba team introduced the main dispute focus in the trial.

Specifically include: whether Henan consumer association can put forward the lawsuit claim of “refund one compensation three”; Whether the company involved should jointly bear the responsibility of “one refund and three compensation”, and if necessary, how to calculate the amount of refund and compensation that should be borne by all parties; Whether there is a legal basis for permanently shutting down Simba and its companies’ live studio accounts; Whether Henan Consumer Association has performed its public welfare duties before litigation.

As a new form of e-commerce rising in recent years, the introduction, display and publicity of products brought by live broadcasting have broken through the regulatory scope of laws and regulations such as advertising law. At present, a series of laws and regulations have been issued, including the code of conduct for webcast marketing, the measures for the supervision and administration of online transactions and the measures for the administration of webcast marketing (for Trial Implementation). The regulatory authorities have also launched special rectification actions to make it clear that “the problem of illegal and illegal profits shall be strictly dealt with”, including the false publicity of marketing goods.

In the view of Ma Xiangxiang, partner of Beijing Anjie law firm, “there is a complete and mature rule system for live broadcasting with goods. However, in specific practice, relevant subjects need to comply with the requirements of laws and regulations”. She pointed out that a remarkable feature of digital economic governance is multiple collaborative governance. Therefore, consumer organizations, industry associations and other institutions should play an important role in the supervision and governance of live broadcasting and goods.

Therefore, the lawsuit initiated by Henan Consumer Association is known as the first public interest litigation case of live delivery of goods. All parties believe that this case is of great significance to the normative development of this emerging industry.

01

The whole story of “false bird’s nest incident”

At the end of October 2020, consumers pointed out that the bird’s nest sold by Simba’s anchor “Shida Meili” in the live studio was actually sugar water. On November 27 of the same year, Simba issued a letter of apology, saying that when the involved “Mingzhi” bird’s nest products were promoted and sold in the live broadcasting room, “there was indeed exaggerated publicity, and the ingredient of bird’s nest was less than 2G per bowl”. Simba put forward the “first compensation scheme”, recalled all the “Mingzhi” brand bird’s nest products sold in Xinxuan live studio, and promised to refund one for three.

On December 23 of the same year, the Guangzhou municipal market supervision bureau reported the investigation and handling situation and planned to impose an administrative penalty of ordering Guangzhou Heyi e-commerce Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as “Guangzhou Heyi”), the founder of the live broadcasting room involved, to stop the illegal act and impose a fine of 900000 yuan. Guangzhou Rongyu Trading Co., Ltd., the main seller of goods involved in the case, was ordered to stop the illegal act and fined 2 million yuan.

On the same day, the official microblog of Kwai e-commerce also announced that after the incident, the brand’s bird’s nest products were taken off the shelves of Kwai e-commerce in the whole station, and the e-commerce function of “Shida Meili” account was banned for 14 days; Xin Youzhi (Simba), the person in charge of Heyi in Guangzhou to which the anchor belongs, was required to properly deal with the after-sales problems and cooperate with the investigation of relevant departments. The live broadcast of Xin Youzhi’s personal account was suspended from November 17.

The announcement also said that according to the investigation and handling by the Guangzhou municipal market supervision bureau, Kwai e-commerce decided to take further measures: from now on, the account of “Shida Meili” will be closed for 60 days; Close Xin Youzhi’s personal account for 60 days. In addition, the accounts of 27 e-commerce anchors of Guangzhou Heyi and its affiliated companies were closed for 15 days, and the company was required to organize their e-commerce anchors for relevant training and learning.

However, the incident did not end here. In August, 2021, Henan consumers’ Association filed a civil public interest lawsuit against Kwai company, Simba and related companies, requiring them to jointly bear the liability of “one refund and three compensation” and joint and several liability, with a total amount of 79.714156 million yuan.

In January 2022, after the lawsuit was disclosed, Xinxuan group announced that after the “bird’s nest incident”, it had put forward an advance compensation scheme on November 27, 2020, that is, recalling the products of the live broadcasting room and promising to refund one for three. As of January 14, 2022, the company has paid a total of 41.439 million yuan to consumers, and the compensation scheme is still valid.

02

Does the consumer association have the right to file public interest litigation?

Henan Consumer Association said in the indictment that at the end of December 2020, Henan Consumer Association successively received consumer complaints and complaints. The bird’s nest purchased in Simba live studio had problems and was suspected of cheating consumers. After investigation and verification, it is determined that it infringes on many unspecified consumers (including 2124 transaction notes in Henan Province, with a total transaction amount of 601000 yuan). Henan Consumer Association believes that this incident infringed on the legitimate rights and interests of many unspecified consumers, caused serious damage to social and public interests, and met the legal conditions for filing consumer civil public interest litigation.

According to the interpretation of the Supreme People’s Court on Several Issues concerning the application of law in the trial of consumer civil public interest litigation cases (revised in 2020) (hereinafter referred to as the interpretation of consumer civil public interest litigation), which came into force on January 1, 2021, the conduct of the defendant in filing consumer civil public interest litigation infringes the legitimate rights and interests of many unspecified consumers, or has the potential to endanger the personal Proof materials of preliminary evidence of damage to social and public interests such as property safety risk. For the trial of such cases, the court needs to first review the relevant supporting materials submitted by the local consumer association.

According to the previous public information, Simba took the initiative to announce the first Refund Scheme of “one refund and three compensation” on November 27, 2020. Simba said that as of the date of the trial, all consumers who can be contacted by Guangzhou Heyi and meet the refund conditions have been compensated.

Then, the Henan Consumer Association submitted a civil complaint to the Henan intermediate people’s court in August 2021. On the Simba side

title: Is NFT a big change or real hype?
body:
The number of words in this article: 3368, about 6 minutes when reading

A mosaic painting sold for 450 million yuan, an ape head for 100 million yuan, and a twitter with five English words for 20 million yuan. The seemingly unimaginable cases are not only people’s expectation of the meta universe, but also the result of the “foam” of the prevalence of market speculation and arbitrage. The risk of scalding should be prevented. The yuan universe in full swing urgently needs to put out the virtual fire and eliminate the turnips.

(Chen Qianling, special commentator of Finance and economics e-Law)

The meta universe of virtual and real fusion has not yet taken shape, but various magical scenes have occurred frequently in reality.

At Christie’s auction house, the NFT painting “every day: the first five thousand days” by artist beeple was auctioned, and finally dropped the hammer at a sky high price of US $69.346 million (about 450 million yuan). The work is a digital image composed of 5000 works. In contrast, in the same month, Sotheby’s auction house held the auction of Van Gogh’s masterpiece “Montmartre Street View”, which was sold at a price of 13.091 million euros (about 100 million yuan).

It sounds puzzling that a pure digital painting is much more expensive than the original work of famous artists.

However, it has been proved that beeple’s sky high auction is not an example. In the past two years, the “meta universe works” relying on NFT technology have frequently sold surprisingly high prices——

NBA star curry spent $180000 to buy the “boring monkey” NFT avatar; Sun Yuchen, founder of wave field Tron, took a picture of an ape NFT head for $15 million (about 100 million yuan).

Jack Dorsey, the co-founder of twitter, put his first tweet sent out in 2006 on the auction website with only one sentence “just setting up my twttr” and clinched a deal with us $2.9 million (about RMB 18.88 million).

After a whole day of fierce competition, the price of the moving picture of “rainbow cat” was finally set at 300 ether coins, which was worth about $560000 at that time.

All kinds of incredible cases can’t help but make us wonder - why can the works of metauniverse sell at such a high price?

01

Why are NFT works worth so much money?

From the bottom logic, it is people’s optimism and expectation for the complete transformation of the meta universe and the current art market.

We know that the “value” of works of art lies in its scarcity, emphasizing the exclusivity of the owner in their possession, use, income and disposal. However, in the digital art market, you can easily use and disseminate the works created by the originator in a time-consuming and labor-consuming way by simply “copying” and “pasting”. There are various means of plagiarism, and the problem of authenticity of works is difficult to solve Therefore, the digital art market has failed to open space.

The “meta universe works” relying on NFT and blockchain technology can solve the key pain points of the traditional digital art market and is expected to burst into vitality no less than that of the traditional art market.

First, “protect genuine products”.

The full English name of NFT is non fungible token, which translates into Chinese: non homogenous token, which is indivisible, irreplaceable and unique. The so-called homogenized token, namely ft (fungible token), can replace and divide each other, that is, there is no difference between an FT in your hand and an FT in mine.

Non homogeneous tokens, namely NFT, are unique and inseparable tokens, and each token is unique. Therefore, mapping the works to the blockchain to generate NFT is equivalent to giving it a unique, authentic and permanent identity, which is the key credential to realize the original authentication, and relying on the tamper proof and traceable blockchain technology, it can realize the real record of the whole process of the subsequent transaction flow information of the works, so as to realize the effective ownership of digital works.

The second is to “crack down on piracy”.

“Infringement relief difficulty” has always been an important problem perplexing network copyright protection. It is difficult to prove, identify and remedy. Under the meta universe technology, if you suspect that your work has been plagiarized, you can find all relevant information in the blockchain, including the information of the creator, “who created what content at what time”, as well as the relevant information of other subjects’ use and possession of the work. At this time, you can take the relevant records as judicial evidence. This change has undoubtedly greatly reduced the cost of proof for the parties.

The third is “revenue recovery”.

In the traditional art trade, once the works are sold, they can only get a one-time return. However, in the form of meta universe, since the transaction link can be executed through smart contract, each transaction can be recorded automatically, which makes it possible for the creator to “get a share” from each subsequent circulation of the work. In the smart contract, the creator can agree on a certain proportion of subsequent revenue sharing, so the payment of each transaction can be automatically withdrawn to his account in each re circulation of the work.

It can be predicted that with the continuous maturity of metauniverse technologies such as NFT and blockchain, the solution of traditional copyright problems will completely open the digital content market, and the whole links of production, circulation and distribution of works will be reshaped.

02

The risk of heat to scald needs to be paid attention to

Although metacosmic technologies such as NFT have great advantages in stimulating the vitality of original ecology and promoting the reform and innovation of art market, they also have problems and risks that can not be underestimated.

First of all, as the saying goes, the ideal is full and the reality is skinny. Although metauniverse has great potential to subvert the digital content market, it is still a long way from the realization of the vision.

To realize the copyright protection of metacosmic works, the key is to “link the works”. However, as the blockchain technology is not yet fully mature, the larger the file of NFT works, the higher the storage cost on the chain. Therefore, at present, most NFT artworks are still stored in the form of off chain. In this case, they can only rely on the centralized server. Once the server is attacked, the security of the works will be greatly threatened.

And even if we can “work on the chain”

title: In the first half of the year, these new scientific achievements may change our lives
body:
Xinhua Beijing, July 3 (Wang Ying) scientific and technological innovation drives reform and development, and innovative achievements change your and my life. In the first half of 2018, China made many new breakthroughs and discoveries in the field of science. These new achievements continue to refresh the public’s perception of science and technology, and are also changing our lives.

The world’s first individual cell cloned monkey was born in China, which has a new prospect for the treatment of major brain diseases

The picture shows the somatic cloned monkeys “Zhongzhong” and “Huahua” provided by the Chinese Academy of Sciences

At a press conference held on January 24 this year, the Chinese Academy of Sciences announced that China has achieved somatic cloning of non-human primates for the first time in the world. Cell, an international academic journal of biology, published this achievement as a cover article and was published online on January 25, 2018. This achievement marks that China has taken the lead in opening a new era of using somatic cloned monkeys as experimental animal models, and has realized the transformation of China from international “parallel” to “leading” in the field of non-human primate research.

In addition to being of great significance in basic research, this achievement also contributes to solving the major challenges in the field of population health in China. It is reported that the use of somatic cell cloning technology to make brain disease model monkeys has brought unprecedented bright prospects for the mechanism research, intervention, diagnosis and treatment of major brain diseases faced by humans.

Chinese scientists took the lead in discovering the activation mechanism of human embryos, laying a foundation for eugenics

In March this year, the Beijing Genomics Institute of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, in cooperation with a number of domestic scientific research institutions, revealed the mystery of orderly gene expression, development and evolution of human embryos for the first time in the world. The research results were published in the international academic journal Cell.

Research shows that almost all kinds of cells in human body have a large number of gene expression. However, about two days after human fertilization is very special, during which there is almost no gene expression in the embryo. Scientists have found the key molecule that initiates the expression of the human genome (Oct4), and found that in the history of evolution, the first gene (old gene) will be expressed first, while the last gene will often be expressed later. The study also revealed an important new mechanism of human evolution. Scientific research shows that DNA mutation will cause human evolution. There is a kind of DNA fragment called transposon in the DNA sequence. They often jump from one region to another, which will produce DNA mutation. The research results have opened the door to understanding the gene expression regulation of human embryonic development, and will provide a theoretical basis for human eugenics.

The birth of the world’s first neurological disease model pig promotes the treatment of Alzheimer’s disease and other diseases

The picture shows the knock in pig of Huntington’s chorea gene. Source: Popular Science China

According to the Chinese Academy of Sciences, after four years of efforts, the international research team led by Guangdong scientists successfully bred the world’s first case of Huntington’s chorea gene knockin pig by using gene editing technology (CRISPR / cas9) and somatic cell nuclear transfer technology for the first time. It can accurately simulate human neurodegenerative diseases, provide stable and reliable animal models for the treatment of Huntington’s chorea, Alzheimer’s disease and other diseases, and promote drug screening and treatment plan formulation. The results were published online in the journal Cell in the early morning of March 30, Beijing time.

As the world’s first case of Huntington’s disease gene knock into the pig model, the researchers introduced that it will promote the development of the pharmaceutical R & D industrial chain of large animal disease model in China, and promote the R & D process of new drugs for neurodegenerative diseases such as Alzheimer’s disease and Parkinson’s disease, as well as immune deficiency, tumor and metabolic diseases. At the same time, the animal model can be used for preclinical evaluation of stem cell therapy and other means, and ultimately benefit mankind.

Scientists have discovered more than 100 gene loci that affect human hair color, making it possible for more accurate forensic DNA phenotypic characterization

The picture is provided by the Chinese Academy of Sciences for hair color classification for genome-wide association analysis

Scientists from the Beijing Genomics Institute of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and scientific research institutions in several other countries have newly discovered more than 100 genes that affect human hair color, breaking the previous understanding that human hair color is mainly determined by several known genes, which helps to accurately predict the hair color of unknown criminals through DNA. The research results were published in the international journal Nature Genetics.

Previous researchers believe that human hair color is mainly determined by several known genes. This study shows that in addition to the known genes, hair color is affected by more than 100 newly discovered genetic loci. Human hair color prediction based on the newly discovered loci has higher accuracy, is conducive to guiding the follow-up study of human complex phenotypic genetics, and provides the possibility for more accurate forensic DNA phenotypic characterization.

Chinese scientists first revealed that the atomic resolution image and magic number effect of hydrated ions can shorten the battery charging time and increase the battery power

After obtaining the world’s first sub molecular level resolved image of water molecules in 2014, Jiang Ying’s scientific research team, a professor at the quantum material science center of the school of physics of Peking University, obtained the atomic level resolved image of hydrated sodium ions for the first time in the world, and found a magic number effect of hydrated ion transport. The results were published in the international academic journal Nature on May 14.

The results show that the transport of ions in the confined environment or nanofluids can be controlled by changing the symmetry and periodicity of the surface lattice, so as to selectively enhance or weaken the transport capacity of certain ions, which has important potential significance for many related application fields, such as ion batteries, anti-corrosion, electrochemical reaction, seawater desalination, biological ion channels and so on. “ In addition, the experimental technology of the research exhibition has also pushed the research accuracy of hydration interaction to the atomic level for the first time. It is expected to be applied to more and wider hydrate systems and open up a new research field in the future.

China has successfully developed the first fully automatic stem cell induction and culture equipment in the world, laying the equipment foundation for regenerative medicine and precision medicine

The picture is provided by Chinese Academy of Sciences on the operation console of automatic stem cell induction and culture equipment

The development of the national major scientific research equipment development project “fully automatic stem cell induction and culture equipment” undertaken by Guangzhou Institute of biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, marks the birth of the world’s first intelligent stem cell induction and culture equipment with no one to stick to and deep neural network.

This device has completely independent intellectual property rights and is established from cell culture

title: Huida gene completed hundreds of millions of yuan of round C financing, and Kunlun capital continued to overweight
body:
On May 12, Huida gene, China’s first independently developed crispr-cas13 gene editing tool company, announced that it had completed hundreds of millions of yuan of round C financing, and the old shareholders Sherpa investment, Chende capital and Kunlun capital continued to add.

The funds obtained from this round of financing will be used for the company’s technological innovation and pipeline R & D, product registration and clinical development, GMP pilot production base construction and team expansion.

In October 2018, Shanghai Hui gene editing Co., Ltd. was established to research and develop rare genetic diseases and gene substitutes for human health. Now it has more than 10000 square meters of venues, such as R & D laboratory, drug process development and analysis laboratory, model animal test center and so on. It has more than 150 employees, of which the R & D team accounts for more than 70%.

▲ Huida gene office building

The R & D pipeline covers many fields such as central nervous system, ophthalmology, muscle and hearing, and has a number of global leading technology platforms, covering the integrated R & D capabilities from drug target screening, drug optimization, efficient animal model construction, to preclinical R & D such as efficacy and toxicological analysis, to drug technology development, production and transformation of CMC, and drug clinical and registration application.

In December 2021, the bottom patents of gene editing system crispr-cas13 system cas13x (also known as cas13e) and cas13y (also known as cas13f) independently developed by Huida gene team were officially granted the patent right by the U.S. Patent Office, becoming China’s first crispr-cas13 gene editing tool independently developed and FTO (free to operate) clean, breaking the patent monopoly of Europe and America in the field of bottom gene editing tools. In the same month, Huida gene reached the first foreign general technology license agreement with a well-known domestic cell therapy enterprise, which shows that the industry highly recognizes Huida gene’s innovative R & D strength and research advantages in the field of gene editing. At the same time, the company’s R & D team combined bioinformatics and protein structure to carry out sequence evolution of cas13x / cas13y, which significantly improved the targeted editing efficiency (in vitro  ~~100%, in vivo~~  95%) and the editing specificity (elimination of by stand effects). Cas13x / y RNA editing system has verified its effectiveness and safety in different types of cells and targets, mice and non-human primates. The company has made a comprehensive patent layout for the system and its related further transformation and derivative technologies at home and abroad.

In addition, Huida group has actively expanded CRISPR gene editing technology and gene therapy strategy, and has successfully independently developed a new DNA editor cas12max in the near future. Cas12max is an RNA directed DNase, belonging to V-I subtype in class II CRISPR CAS system. Compared with the reported DNA editors such as cas9 and cas12a, cas12max is smaller ( ~~1000aa) and suitable for gene editing in vitro and in vivo. At the same time, the company’s R & D team comprehensively optimized cas12max in combination with AI, bioinformatics and protein structure, which significantly improved the targeted editing efficiency (in vitro~~  100%), editing specificity and PAM recognition. At present, the technology has reached preliminary cooperation intentions with a number of biotechnology companies. The development and optimization of crispr-cas12max system means the opening of a new chapter of in vivo gene therapy of the company, and also provides better treatment means and more possibilities for curing diseases in the fields of nerve, muscle, ophthalmology and other indications.

* Какая сумма доступна для обмена, она должна быть не меньше той, которую вы хотите обменять
* Размер ордера - минимальная и максимальная суммы, с которыми готов работать торговец. Например A\*\* (скриншот выше) может продать вам USDT на 100 рублей, не меньше.
* Способ оплаты - у торговца должен быть указан такой же способ оплаты, как и добавленный вами в настройки, иначе обмен не получится.

Подобрав нужного торговца нажимайте “Купить USDT” и вводите интересующую вас сумму

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8lGfjY1DkxHleKloBthN1.png?height=496&width=789)

Нажимайте кнопку “Купить USDT”, после этого вы попадете в торговый чат, где увидите номер карты торговца, на который нужно отправить рубли.

Когда торговец подтвердит, что получил перевод криптовалюта зачислится на ваш счет.

### Продаем крипту

На панели сверху выбирайте “Продать”, правее выбирайте крипту, которую хотите продать, например крипто доллар BTC и еще правее местную валюту которую хотите получить, например рубль.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/v1dpLQn2r2F9q90HgGtBi.png?height=582&width=1612)

Далее как и с покупкой выбирайте подходящего торговца, обратите внимание на его лимиты и способ оплаты.

После нажатия на кнопку “Продать” введите интересующую вас сумму и еще раз нажимайте “Продать”

После этого вы попадете в чат с торговцем, дождитесь, когда на вашу карту придут рубли от торговца и только после этого отправляйте ему криптовалюту нажимая на кнопку “Отправить криптовалюту”.

## Обмен крипты на крипту

Допустим вам прислали оплату в BTC и вы хотите зафиксировать свои средства в более стабильной валюте, например USDT (крипто доллар, привязан к курсу доллара США). Тут все довольно просто:

На верхней панели выбирайте “Торги” и “Конвертировать”

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YHt3gGiTXQUtJFEDtPdE-.png?height=875&width=1882)

Откроется окно, в котором нужно выбрать какую крипту вы отдаете (например BTC) и какую хотите получить (например USDT). Вводите интересующую вас сумму и нажимайте кнопку “Конвертировать”. Данный обмен происходит автоматически, без участия человека с другой стороны.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Gnzcz1KSwSiDRkdnlXsMc.png?height=618&width=752)

Готово, вы обменяли биткоин на крипто доллар и теперь можете обменять его на рубли по достаточно стабильному курсу, либо использовать в любых других целях.

## Перевести крипту на биржу

Если вы не покупали крипту самостоятельно, а хотите получить перевод от другого человека не ваш счет на бирже, сделать это можно так:

На верхней панели находите кнопку “Активы” и там нажимайте “Пополнить”.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7DBEkXyvgM5_NPINHrrIK.png?height=647&width=1874)

Далее выбирайте интересующую вас валюту и (ОЧЕНЬ ВАЖНО!) сеть, из которой вы будете ее получать. Например биткоин (BTC) можно получить в основной сети BTC-Bitcoin или в сети BTC-Lightning. Уточняйте у отправителя средств как именно он будет это делать и только после этого сообщайте ему адрес для перевода.

Увидеть список ваших активов на бирже можно в разделе “Мои активы”, он находится в меню “Активы” на верхней панели. Пополнение можно осуществлять так же из этого раздела.

title: How we found our Teddy :)
body:
Last summer Sam FaceTime'd me & was talking to me about NFT’s. I knew what NFT’s were before we had that conversation but just never paid attention to it. He said : bro this space is perfect for you, don’t ask me why just go on twitter & join any NFT twitter space and you’ll find your journey, I am so excited to see where this story goes from here…

I still remember saying : bro it’s 4 in the morning rn on a Saturday night and you’re telling me to go on twitter space rn and follow some monkey’s??? lol

In my mind I was like this dude’s lit & out of his right frame of mind. Finishing our sentences he said Teddy trust me, I know you and I am telling you this is a one way ticket to the life you have always dreamed but never lived and opportunities like this are very hard to find. I just laughed at it and I was like I’ll think about it and let you know…

Then after a week I was playing soccer with Shadow in my backyard thinking about what Sam said the other day and tbh I enjoyed hearing him & everything he had to say with enthusiasm over the potential of NFT’s. Btw Sam is a well known artist in the space, and now after spending all this time in this space I get it why he was hyper that day. Anyways, then I went on my twitter and switched my profile form private to public. I joined my first twitter space, It was with @NFTPrince & NFTsquirrels. Both are living legends and I respect them a lot. They shared tons of selfless advice to me on first day without even knowing who I was, what my real name is, or how I looked like. The knowledge was so valuable that basically I’ve never been rugged / scammed in this space till date. 

After spending some time in different spaces and observing how everything is working in this ecosystem, I focused on the fundamentals, the way people interact and react with certain things, what values they carried, and how do they find their feeling of importance. It was’nt very difficult for me to figure these things out because of my knowledge & experience with Social Media for over 5 years. I grew 36 million+ followers on Instagram via different entertainment pages and a network of over 250 million+ followers via networking in less than 6 months with just 2,000$ to start with from my college dorm.

During that time Bored Ape’s were just flying and they still are but the vibes were immaculate last year you can’t deny that. I literally did a PHD on them and I was just astounded by their story but I was able to relate a lot of it to my life, it was so inspiring and fascinating. I was thinking so much about it, that even in my dreams I was seeing NFT’s all around me and my life changed the night of September 30 when i had that one lucid dream, I decided to do a project to share my story so that others can relate to it and be a part of it. 

( Note : This was’nt the main reason for me to do a NFT project. My main goal was and is still the same today that I want to leave this NFT space better than how I found it. )

Back to the story, why Teddy? Well obviously. My friend’s call me Teddy and Teddies have been a part of everyone’s childhood and I believe people will hold on to that tradition forever. They provide us the comfort & companionship, a friend to talk to, and it’s not just kids who benefit from the positive effects of a comforting Teddy squeeze. Teddies are just universal and timeless.

I put all of my traits and character and imagination’s in the art, from my expressions to the way I dress. Some of the assets are added for the aesthetics of the collection. I am not an artist but since I was the character I worked with few freelance artist’s to bring my idea on paper. They asked me for a sketch to give an idea of what I wanted and this is what I sent them lmao 😂😂😂😂😂😂

![ That Yu-Gi-Oh and LV belt part has my heart lmaoooo😭😭😭. Tbh this image is still a lot better than my first one. Btw I am not rich lol, I don't have a AP watch or fancy items.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/p7SJwXfpBXm-_G9fiTlu0.jpg?height=1280&width=960)

![This looks decent lol. Lot better than what I came up with.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Vxl5Z9dogU0G7wxHt-euI.png?height=1280&width=720)

![That's me on the Left! Dw I am doxed to all our past holder's and lot of people in NFT space know me irl. My identity is just not public in the space atm. I'll reveal it when time is right.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CL1JyGEQS_ynX1v0M1WGn.png?height=1280&width=1280)

Back to the story, so once I got this I reached out to few professional artist’s in my network and I worked with multiple of them to find the perfect Teddy. We wanted to stick with 2D because 3D art is great but the market seemed to be doing well with 2D more than 3D collections. Ofcs art style isn’t the main reason for it but it does play a role. But then I am like let’s take the challenge and create something insane. During the time when I started the project, their were’nt any 3D project’s coming out just yet nor there were any noticeable Teddy Bear collections popping as long as I know. So then we decided to turn this into 3D. During this process one 3D artist reached out to me in my DM’s of one our meme page asking to collab, I am like okay cool lets give it a shot and see what you got. 

![This is what he came up with as base model. 💀💀💀](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FcshCcWqBzufElk9puKnW.png?height=772&width=778)

Yeah he just lost me on that base model. If ur surprised, I did’nt see this coming either, when I saw it for the first time I was out of words just like you are rn. I seriously had no comments on this image. So yeah I had to say no to that dude and look for another artist. The fact that people fake their LinkedIn and show you proof of work of other artist is just hilarious. So I asked one of my friend on telegram if he knew any artist to connect me and he did. 

![Idk tbh, it was just not it.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Z3yiJzSTaGmqQdaHZroTJ.png?height=1280&width=1280)

It just did’nt feel right going with the full body at this point, gave pfp style a shot and see how it does. Initially the idea was, we will do pfp collection and in a seperate contract and we will give the holders full body version of their Teddy so they have both and can use it the way they like whether to animate or so with the source file…

![I finally said yes to this one and made a deal with the artist and gave her an upfront amount for her time that we both agreed on. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ef-d0SnN5nrZH4EpHIfbn.png?height=1280&width=1280)

The decided to upfront because she told me she had financial instability and urgently need of money for rent and expenses so she would’nt be able to work full time on this project and it would take lot longer to complete the collection than what I was expecting. Plus I genuinely wanted to help her regardless of if she would work for the project or not due to her situation. 

![My mind, Her ability.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Q7q8YdENYDP5zDlajLh05.png?height=1280&width=1280)

We decided to fully render and rigg the collection in the end after all the traits and assets are illustrated and confirmed so that their isn't any confusions and nothing is left out. But unfortunately when she submitted, the quality of collection turned out terrible atleast from my pov. I communicated it with our community and told them that ‘guys we do not have the collection fully rigged and its in between 2D and 3D so we would have to pause the project for now until we find another artist and see how things go from there’. 

But then I was also out of funds because I put everything I had in the project initially. So I communicated this with the community in our discord and 34 people ended up minting 100 regardless of the situation. 10 were minted for team and 1 was minted by me personally to participate in the process just like any other member of community. They knew that mint had zero value and won’t have a secondary market value but yet they still supported. So that moment onwards my belief in the project became even stronger and quitting was never an option no matter what situation I go through. The collection won’t ever be revealed because I don’t believe in trying to sell some bullshit to people just to pocket some eth. In trying to sell NFT’s I am not going to sell my character, tf I look like? ZagaBond? There is a big fat difference between failing and abandoning your project. We don’t give up around here…This project is my dream and it like a child to me. I want to be the best out there in anything I do in life. Whether if it is playing soccer or anything that I hold dear too I give my absolute best to win. When I play soccer I don’t play to just participate I play to make difference, I play to dominate the field. 

[https://opensea.io/collection/toxicteddyclub](https://opensea.io/collection/toxicteddyclub)

So yeah that was my first failure in NFT space, I learned a lot from that failure. The most important thing was that when starting a business do everything you can to gather great people that have the same drive & BELIEVE IN YOUR VISION as you do. Because in the end all a business is a group of people dedicated to provide service or product to people. Take care of your team like your family & they’ll take care of your business & customers. 

Then after I did an outreach again and managed to find a team of 4 professional 3D artist’s. Their past ventures have involved working with brands like Puma, Bangs and Lulu Lemon. Their Identities are anon as they wish to keep it that way but I have confirmed the veracity of their credentials. When I presented this entire idea and vision of the collection to them, after hearing me they instantly said yes and told be that we believe in you and we’re gonna make the best collection of 2022. We started working on it the same day and even with this team, I worked 1 on 1 with the team over screen shares for every single trait’s and asset’s and outcomes are just fantastic. Look It does’nt matter what people think of it but we do believe it is one of the greatest NFT collections that will ever be deployed on Blockchain. We’ve put our blood, sweat and tears in this collection as a team day in and day out. The collection is timeless & it will age well I can make that one promise for sure. 

![This collection is dedicated to someone who does'nt need to own it. It's a dream come true. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wKl-h3xgt9G73xjvxW_7_.png?height=1280&width=1280)

There is no bigger feeling than making your dream come true and the story will never have an end to be honest. I am just the captain of the boat as of now but at some point I want to hand the dream over to the community in a position that even if I am not present the story live forever as long as their is imagination left in this world. 

Big hug & Thank you for your time and consideration for reading this. I genuinely appreciate your presence here with all my heart.

title: International first time! Zhurong found signs of recent water activity on Mars
body:
◎ science and Technology Daily reporter Lu Chengkuan

Chinese scientists have found signs of water activity on Mars.

On May 11, science progress published an important research result on Martian water activities. Based on the short wave infrared spectrum and navigation Terrain Camera data obtained by the Mars rover zhurong, Chinese researchers found a plate-shaped bright colored rock similar to sedimentary rock on the surface of Mars. Further analysis found that these plate-shaped bright colored rocks are rich in minerals such as water bearing sulfate.

This marks the first time that zhurong international has used the short wave infrared spectrometer on the rover to detect water bearing minerals in situ on Mars.

“The discovery of signs of water activity in the relatively young geological age landing area of zhurong indicates that the Martian hydrosphere during the Amazon period may be more active than previously thought. This discovery is of great significance to understand the evolution history of Martian climate and environment.” Liu Yang, the first author and corresponding author of the paper and researcher of the National Space Science Center of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said.

The zhurong Mars rover carried by China’s first Mars exploration mission tianwen-1 successfully landed in the southern region of Utopia plain on May 15, 2021. Up to now, the Mars rover zhurong has been traveling in the utopian plain in the northern lowlands of Mars for one year, with a total of nearly 2000 meters, and has obtained a large number of valuable scientific exploration data.

The existing dating work of the impact crater shows that the landing area of the Mars rover zhurong is located in the Amazon stratum after the later reconstruction event. During the Amazon period, the climate of Mars has changed from warm and humid to cold and dry. The analysis of orbital remote sensing data shows that a variety of geomorphic features distributed around the landing site indicate that there may have been a large amount of volatile matter in the utopian plain.

However, “limited by the spatial resolution and coverage, the orbital remote sensing data did not find water bearing minerals near the landing area, which brings many questions about the formation mechanism of such landforms and the nature of water activities in the area.” Liu Yang said.

The research team believes that the plate-shaped bright colored rock found by zhurong is a hard shell developed locally in the landing area. Compared with the broken rocks observed in situ by the American pirate 1 Mars Lander, the hard shell in the zhurong landing area seems to be more erosion resistant, and the hard shell layer is relatively thick.

“Forming such a thick hard shell requires a lot of liquid water, which cannot be formed only by water vapor in the atmosphere.” Liu Yang explained.

At the same time, the study found that there was no obvious surface runoff or river trace in the landing area, and no fluffy surface and salt frost residues formed by water evaporation were found around the inspection route, which ruled out the possibility of large-scale water activities on the surface of the landing area.

In this regard, the research team proposed a new formation mechanism. This mechanism suggests that the soil weathering layer before the Martian sedimentary period experienced cementation and diagenesis during the rise or infiltration of salt rich groundwater, forming the observed tabular rocks. Salt cements precipitate in capillary pores or groundwater near the water table, and active evaporation and accumulation occur. The intermittent fluctuation of groundwater level may further thicken the hard shell and form layered structure. Subsequently, the topsoil covered on the hard shell is eroded away, exposing the erosion resistant hard shell layer.

Liu Yang said that the discovery of the zhurong Rover showed that the water activity of Mars during the Amazon period may be more active than previously thought. The zhurong landing area and the extensive area of the northern plains of Mars may contain a large amount of available water in the form of hydrous minerals.

Reviewed by: Yue Liang

title: Beijing's first thief Daxing was arrested on national day and hid six mobile phones and several bank cards
body:
The first thief on National Day was arrested and hid multiple mobile phones

The two suspects have been criminally detained and the case is still under further trial

In recent days, tourists and citizens have gathered in major public places to celebrate the national day. In order to protect their safety, the police of the Beijing Mobile Investigation Corps hid in the crowd and did not miss a trace of trouble. On October 1, national day, the first thief was arrested in Daxing Yizhuang. Yesterday’s Mid Autumn Festival, the police arrested five pickpockets in Orson. Since the national day, all the police of the Beijing Mobile Investigation Corps have stuck to their posts and arrested 32 pickpocketing suspects.

The first thief Daxing bus station was arrested

Since the national day, when tourists and citizens gather in public places and scenic spots, there are some invisible guards at the entrances and exits of the surrounding bus and subway stations, parks and scenic spots. They look no different from other tourists, but their sharp eyes keep scanning the wind and grass in the crowd, secretly guarding the safety of tourists. They are the police of the mobile Investigation Corps of the Municipal Public Security Bureau.

On the morning of October 1, the mobile Investigation Corps and the police of Yizhuang police station found two men acting suspiciously while carrying out pickpocketing, patrol and control along the bus in Yizhuang. The police followed the control all the way to nandahongmen bus station. When two men stole a passenger’s mobile phone, they were arrested by the police on the spot. Subsequently, the police seized 6 stolen mobile phones and 1 Wallet (including 2 ID cards and several bank cards) from the car driven by the two suspects.

14 pickpockets were arrested on the same day

After examination, the suspects Li and Wang explained the illegal facts of stealing seven mobile phones and one wallet. At present, the two suspects have been criminally detained by Daxing Branch. The case is still under further investigation.

The reporter of Beijing Youth Daily learned from the mobile Investigation Corps that Li and Wang were the first thieves arrested by Beijing anti pickpocketing police during the national day week.

On October 1, the whole police of the mobile Investigation Corps of the Municipal Public Security Bureau dispatched to successively crack 6 pickpocketing cases and 14 pickpocketing suspects in Beijing subway station, Tiananmen Jinshui bridge, Beijing West Railway Station subway, Beihai north railway station, Yuanda Road station and other places.

Five pickpockets in Orson were caught yesterday

Yesterday’s Mid Autumn Festival, Beijing was clear and crisp in autumn, which was especially suitable for travel. The Olympic Forest Park has also welcomed tourists from all over the country.

It is reported that in view of the characteristics of large passenger flow and pickpockets during the Olympic Forest Park Festival, the mobile Investigation Corps and Chaoyang Branch deploy special police forces to jointly carry out pickpocketing operations to escort the people.

At 2:40 PM, “don’t move, police!” With a loud cry, several plainclothes arrested a man at the entrance of the Olympic Forest Park Station of Metro Line 8. It turned out that the man took advantage of the tourists’ inattention to pick up the camera he was carrying, but he didn’t know that his every move had long been mastered by the anti pickpocketing investigators, who arrested him when he succeeded in pickpocketing.

It is understood that on October 4, the Mid Autumn Festival, five pickpocketing suspects were arrested around the Olympic Forest Park and are currently under review by Chaoyang Branch.

Since the National Day holiday, all the police of the mobile Investigation Corps of the Municipal Public Security Bureau have stuck to their posts and arrested 32 pickpocketing suspects, which has advantageously ensured the safety of the people.

Beijing police suggest that there are many people traveling during holidays. Please be sure to improve your safety awareness and pay attention to your belongings in many places such as public transport, shopping in commercial markets and scenic spots to prevent theft.

title: The recent fluctuation of RMB exchange rate is market correction rather than policy guidance
body:
The recent fluctuation of RMB exchange rate is market correction rather than policy guidance

Last week (April 18-22), the closing price (i.e. the closing price of the interbank market at 4:30 p.m.) and the central parity of the domestic RMB exchange rate (hereinafter, if not specifically referred to, refer to the RMB exchange rate against the US dollar) fell below 6.40 to 1 on the 20th and 21st, and closed at 6.4875 and 6.4596 on Friday, respectively. The cumulative decline in that week was 1.7% and 1.0% respectively. Both domestic and foreign exchange rates fell below 6.50 on Friday night. Last November, the central bank proposed for the first time that “the degree of deviation is directly proportional to the correction force”. The correction of market forces finally came again.

I guessed this round of RMB exchange rate adjustment again

Last year, when the market was bullish that the RMB exchange rate would rise above 6.0, the author said frankly that this would be a small probability event and “guessed” that the RMB might not go as strong as expected. As a result, even though the multilateral exchange rate of RMB increased significantly throughout the year, the bilateral exchange rate of RMB against the US dollar increased by only slightly more than 2%, and the highest price in the year did not rise below 6.34.

This year, the author warned of the possible risks of Fed tightening. At the end of February, the author was invited to write an article and put forward seven spillover channels, four impact scenarios and six countermeasures. The article was officially published at the end of March. A few days ago, when I attended the Tsinghua Wudaokou global financial forum, I further pointed out that the tightening of the Fed’s policy is an important factor affecting the trend of the RMB exchange rate this year, and made judgments in four scenarios or four stages.

In the first scenario or stage, the Federal Reserve will tighten moderately and orderly, the inflow of foreign capital in China will slow down, and the appreciation of RMB will slow down; In the second scenario or stage, the Federal Reserve will increase interest rates more aggressively or even start to shrink the table at the same time, which will cause turbulence in the US economy and financial market, lead to phased capital outflow from China, and the RMB exchange rate will fluctuate in both directions; In the third scenario or stage, the US Federal Reserve’s monetary tightening is stronger than expected, which may puncture the asset foam and trigger an economic recession. China will not be able to survive alone, and the RMB exchange rate will be under pressure again; In the fourth scenario or stage, after the crisis, the Federal Reserve will return to monetary easing. If China can continue to maintain the leading position of economic recovery in the world, it may return to capital return and the RMB exchange rate will be stronger.

At that time, the author made it clear that China has now smoothly passed the first stage - the Federal Reserve’s reduction in bond purchase, but we should still pay high attention and vigilance to the future, because the development and changes of the situation may be nonlinear. Now it seems that the author is unfortunately right. This wave of RMB exchange rate correction since mid March, especially the cumulative drop of one or two cents in the past three trading days, is an important background for the enhanced tightening expectation of the Federal Reserve. At the same time, this also confirms the author’s research experience that using public information can make trend judgment.

The recent sharp decline is a concentrated catharsis of market sentiment

Since the beginning of June 2020, the domestic epidemic has been well prevented and controlled, the economy has recovered rapidly, the external dollar index is weak, and the interest rate gap between China and the United States is large. Together, it points to the appreciation of the RMB exchange rate, which has increased by nearly 10% by the end of the year. Last year, the supporting role of factors such as the slowdown of economic recovery, the turmoil of financial markets, the rebound of the US dollar index and the convergence of China US interest rate spread weakened, but the leading prevention and control of the epidemic and the continuation of foreign demand boom drove the RMB exchange rate to continue to appreciate slightly against the rebound of the US index.

After the interest rate meeting in March this year, with the further rise of US inflation, the expectation of monetary tightening in the market is becoming stronger and stronger. The US index accelerated its rebound, breaking 100 in mid April; US bond yields soared, superimposed on the differentiation of China US monetary policy, and the interest rate spread between China and the United States converged rapidly or even upside down. Last week, the Fed’s “Eagle Song” was louder. Last Monday, St. Louis Fed chairman Brad publicly proposed a one-time interest rate increase of 75 basis points in May; Last Thursday, Powell said at the annual meeting of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) that a 50 basis point interest rate increase would be discussed in May, and a similar interest rate increase might be needed to curb inflation; Last Friday, Nomura Securities latest forecast that the Federal Reserve will raise interest rates by 75 basis points in June and July. Affected by this, the US index stood above 100 last week, the exchange rate of the yen against the US dollar hit a 20-year low, and the exchange rate of the RMB against the yen hit a six-and-a-half-year high.

At the beginning of March, the RMB exchange rate also hit a new high in recent four years, but there have been signs of adjustment since the middle of the year. At that time, the Risk Spillover of the conflict between Russia and Ukraine was superimposed, the supervision of Chinese stocks was strengthened, the domestic epidemic rebounded sharply, and the RMB exchange rate was quickly corrected, wiping out all the gains in last year, and then fluctuated repeatedly around the level at the end of last year. Recently, due to the spread of the epidemic in a few cities, the problem of smooth economic circulation has become more prominent, which has exacerbated the market’s concerns about domestic economic recovery and export prospects. On April 19, the IMF lowered China’s economic growth forecast for this year by 0.4 percentage points, and the RMB exchange rate fell below 6.40 from that day. On April 22, the middle price and closing price fell by 1.7% and 2.2% respectively compared with the end of last month, and fell by 1.3% and 1.8% respectively compared with the end of last year.

Some people attribute the recent fluctuation of RMB exchange rate to the intentional guidance of the central parity quotation mechanism, which is contrary to the fact. Whether the adjustment in mid and late March or recently, it is driven by the offshore market. The offshore RMB exchange rate (CNH) continued to be weak relative to the onshore RMB exchange rate (CNY). The daily average price difference was 1.5% from March 11 to 31 and 2.7% from April 20 to 22. This reflects that after foreign capital reduced its holdings of domestic RMB financial assets, it purchased foreign exchange in the offshore market, driving the weakness of CNH. In addition, the record low exchange rate of the yen against the US dollar triggered speculation about intervening in the depreciation of the yen. In addition, China’s uncertain economic prospects triggered the closing of the yen carry trade of buying high interest rate RMB assets with low interest rate yen. The resulting foreign exchange purchase accelerated the downward trend of CNH and pushed down CNY. If the central bank is wrong, it is also “wrong”. title: create2深入学习
body:
一级理解：create2可以在创建合约前，就预先知道地址

二级：利用create2配合selfdestruct 重复部署不同业务合约在同一个地址上，可以执行类似shellcode的东西，链上无逻辑代码

这次主要说下深入研究第二级的利用

### 概念说明

create2创建合约时，生成的地址主要是受合约的initcode和sender account影响，这里我们可以保证sender不变，那就主要是看这个initcode了，那这个initcode是什么的，要部署不同的业务合约的话，这个initcode不会变吗？

回头看，前面有提到对于合约

Bytecode vs. Runtime Bytecode 
 When compiling a contract, you can either get the contract bytecode or the runtime bytecode.

Bytecode = init code + runtime bytecode 
 bytecode是存在链上的

部署合约的时候，我们知道是会先执行构造函数，构造函数底层 就是会回runtime bytecode的

### 利用

那这就好办，我们就保持initcode 不变，每次runtime bytecode不一样就行了

那怎么做呢，initcode我们可以做成一个[bootstrap](https://github.com/ricmoo/will-o-the-wisp/blob/master/contracts/Springboard.sol)的模型，每次固定从sender合约里面取runtimecode,看别人写出的bootstrap就是一个用汇编硬写出来的

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bT1oFOBv4-teaCYEEb8jc.png?height=1352&width=914)

### 小疑问

这代码看着问题不大，但当时有个地方卡着我，就是staticcall的时候，inarg的参数是从memory取的，那这里看了下，只有一开始的mstore操作了memory,把函数签名写进去了，这个签名函数也正是这次staticcall要调用的函数，没错。但为啥inarg是0x1c呢，一开始写的时候不是写在memory 0处吗，后来实在没办法，就自己也调试一下，后来才发现原来这是大小端的问题，虽然是存在0处，但mstore保扩成32（0x20）个字节，而函数签名只有4字节，他是保存在这32字节的最后4字节处，所以是0x20-4=0x1c处

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OZaxneAZwCAqPRY2M-_Aw.png?height=698&width=1121)

### 小疑问2

虽然这偏移说的通了，但还有个问题，对于内存，solidity里面不是有说memory layout是偏移0x40之前是保留空间，0x40里面保存的是空闲内存偏移吗？为啥这里是0开始算可以用呢？

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LyEhAkhqjstmV20N-i-Bv.png?height=750&width=1249)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dWTttHlQLYz6mPuVJWqD-.png?height=125&width=685)

大哥也是这么说的

PS:

中间突然想起staticcall的问题，也得到大哥的解答

title: It's not that I don't want to contact you, but that I don't know what to say
body:
I don’t know when we began to have less contact. Our chat also moved from the chat box to the circle of friends, then looked at it, and then brushed it calmly until we finally had nothing to say from the initial nothing to the present nothing to say.

Source of the article: wechat official account: one person listens

Dear old friends, maybe we don’t have much contact now, but please believe I’ve never forgotten you. If you can meet at a street corner many years later, I hope you can recognize me at a glance. I used to be my best friend.

Polite greetings

01

Today, when I was brushing the circle of friends, I suddenly saw the news of a junior high school classmate getting married. In the photo, he became a lot more handsome, not like the big fool in junior high school at all. And he is one of the best partners I played in junior high school.

We have a dormitory. We have to go back together after class, eat and play ball together, and even go to the bathroom. We said we would be good brothers for a lifetime, but in high school and college, we all went to different places and schools, and gradually had less contact. Until today, my good brother got married, but I didn’t know.

I sent him a “happy wedding” message. I didn’t receive a “thank you” until just now. I wanted to say something more, but I didn’t know where to start and what to say. It seems that there are only some polite greetings left.

Pass by

02

Along the way, we met many people, some of whom passed by when they became partners, while others passed by when they became partners.

The childhood sweetheart who quarreled over who should be the father and who should be the mother; The little sister who dances rubber bands with you and puts on makeup for the doll; The troublemaker who plays marbles with you and secretly pulls the girl’s hair. Do you remember these people in those years? Do you still have contact?

Time goes on and people go in all directions. Maybe some people just walk away. We always grow up in thinking, grow up in habit and forget in habit. Just like when I first went to college, I always miss my high school classmates, but I also met new classmates and new friends while I miss them, and those old classmates we miss also have new companionship.

Some people accompany her to class instead of us, some people eat with her instead of us, and some people talk gossip with her instead of us, watch Korean dramas, laugh and cry together. Her circle of friends is no longer a lonely selfie and sad words. Gradually, there are group photos of eating, singing and watching movies together, just like the group photos of eating, singing and watching movies together. But now, we don’t know the people and places in the photos, and the comments are gradually less, until there is only an occasional love.

At the same time, we are also busy shuttling around in the new environment, taking the postgraduate entrance examination, or playing games with new friends. Every night is no longer holding a mobile phone to chat with old classmates, and no longer need to ask you how you are doing and how you are doing. After all, your circle of friends has explained everything.

I don’t know when we began to have less contact. Our chat also moved from the chat box to the circle of friends, then looked at it, and then brushed it calmly until we finally had nothing to say from the initial nothing to the present nothing to say.

It dispersed as we walked

03

Adults often say that old classmates should keep in touch. You still have contact with junior high school classmates. What’s the one who used to come to our house to play now. Sorry, I really can’t answer some questions, because we haven’t been in touch for a long time. I don’t know whether I’m too ruthless or time is too meaningless. In short, we are drifting away in the torrent of time.

Friendship may be a phased product, and some people are destined to accompany us only for a period of time. Just like when I studied in Spain, I also met many friends who played very well, but then I returned home and they stayed there. In this way, we seem to be people in two completely different worlds. I said we should prepare for the final exam tomorrow, and he said he was preparing for the Christmas holiday.

When the stage of our common life is over, we move towards a new beginning, have a new environment, new friends, and perhaps the feelings we once had are fading quietly. We chat less and less, and our chat words are shorter and shorter. You have your new world and I have my new life.

Occasionally in the circle of friends to see the dynamics of old friends, think of our crazy days together, want to talk a few words, but don’t know where to start. After all, for a long time, sometimes I really don’t know what to say, and what else belongs to our common topic. After all, the memory will gradually fade until the last sentence is “really, I don’t remember”.

Young and frivolous

04

Indeed, time has changed our appearance, but it has also lengthened our distance. Fortunately, my young frivolous has your participation, and your love is accompanied by me.

Dear old friends, maybe we don’t have much contact now, but please believe I’ve never forgotten you. The happy songs and laughter you have brought me will still emerge one after another when I revisit my hometown. The future that I can’t participate with you will still bless silently in the distance.

title: Will Tesla follow BYD?
body:
The pollution problem of new energy vehicles has surfaced.

Three days after being on the hot search list, BYD’s Changsha plant, which was exposed to pollution incidents, has undergone new changes. According to the report of securities times · e company, on May 10, some production lines of BYD Changsha factory have been shut down for rectification. In the past two months, thousands of residents in more than a dozen communities around BYD’s factory in Yuhua District, Changsha jointly reported that they often smell strong paint smell. According to Phoenix technology, the paint smell is the most serious from the evening to the early morning, and hundreds of children have experienced unexplained epistaxis. After the topic of “suspected nosebleed of many children caused by BYD factory pollution” was put on the hot search, on the same day of May 7, BYD Changsha Yuhua District Industrial Park issued a statement, which did not deny the existence of peculiar smell around the factory and said that “the company has taken relevant measures and actively improved it”. However, for the situation of “nosebleed caused by excessive emission”, the statement said that “it is a malicious fabricated Association and has been reported to the police.” On May 8, the Changsha Government Affairs official account “couch cloth” issued a document saying that the Changsha Municipal Party committee and government had set up an investigation team and stationed in BYD Yuhua District factory to investigate. Relevant media reports pointed out that the source of the odor, or the coating workshop of BYD Yuhua District factory. In fact, BYD has a “criminal record” in this regard. In 2019, Changsha BYD was regarded as a key complained enterprise and included in the key supervision object due to the impact of pollutants discharged from the production waste gas of the spraying workshop on the lives of nearby residents. An employee of a car company in Beijing told boxed lunch finance that painting, electroplating and other links will indeed affect the environment. “Because of environmental protection requirements, we have no painting factories in Beijing, and the corresponding businesses are given to factories in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Shanghai.” According to Chinese philanthropists, citing the views of people in the automobile industry, the coating process of automobile production will produce a large number of pollutants. If not handled properly, it will have an impact on the surrounding atmosphere and water. Among them, the paint waste gas mainly comes from the volatile waste gas produced by the organic solvent contained in the paint during spraying and drying, which is called volatile organic compounds (VOCs), and the main components are benzene, toluene, xylene, etc. The employees of the above car enterprises also said that there was no corresponding fact and it was impossible to confirm that the odor came from BYD production line. China Securities Journal reported on May 8 that some peculiar smell near the factory may be diesel exhaust and engine oil, and the source of the peculiar smell cannot be confirmed. In an interview with China Securities Journal, the staff of the Management Committee of Changsha Yuhua Economic Development Zone said, “we will find a third-party testing institution recognized by the surrounding residents to participate… But the truth needs to be carefully investigated.” 01

When buying a car, few consumers will be aware of the pollution behind the beautiful appearance of the car. Painting on the car surface has two functions: one is decoration, and the other is to protect the car body from corrosion; But on the other hand, coating is also a serious part of exhaust gas in automobile production process. “Paint smell” is the core of the public opinion storm around BYD. Before that, there were many disputes about its coating workshop. In 2019, Changsha BYD was complained about waste gas pollution in the spraying workshop and was included in the key supervision object of local relevant departments. According to a document on the official website of Hunan Provincial Department of ecological environment, the serious paint smell in the coating workshop of BYD Yuhua District factory is basically true, and the document date is May 8, 2021. According to an EIA report in December 2021, the waste gas from the electrophoresis process in the coating workshop was directly and unorganized discharged by BYD Changsha factory in the early stage without collection. In addition, the types and values of 24 organic substances in the report were not disclosed. In three years, the problem of coating workshop has not been solved. BYD’s environmental protection issues have always been highly concerned. Since November 2011, BYD and its affiliated companies have been punished by relevant departments for environmental protection for many times. The reasons for punishment include excessive toluene discharge, excessive exhaust gas discharge, direct discharge of wastewater and other issues. Not only BYD, but also its competitor Tesla has recently attracted criticism for paint related problems. title: A male teacher in Guangxi disguised as "Huafei" wishes students to take the college entrance examination, which is called relieving pressure
body:
Beijing, Nanning, June 2 (Chen Yanyou) recently, a video of “a male teacher disguised as’ Huafei ‘to reduce pressure for college entrance examination students” was popular on the Internet. In the video, a male teacher dressed up as the “Princess Hua” in the biography of Zhen Huan and used his lines to bless the students’ luck in the college entrance examination. He was admitted to a good university. His different expression attracted the students to laugh. On May 31, the reporter found Zhu Guanzhang, the teacher concerned.

The picture shows the scene of the activity. The male teacher dressed as “Hua Fei” to relieve pressure for the college entrance examination students. Zhong Xinshe

Zhu Guanzhang graduated from Guangxi Normal University, majoring in physics. At present, he is a physics teacher in Nanning No. 4 middle school. After 8 years of teaching, I have taken 5 graduating classes and achieved good results.

Zhu Guanzhang introduced that the online video took place on May 25. On that day, a group of teachers in grade three of the school took advantage of the school’s activities to shake themselves into roles such as “Princess Hua”, “ZHUGE Liang”, “Snow White” and “flash man”, so as to reduce pressure for the students about to participate in the college entrance examination by creating a relaxed atmosphere.

The picture shows the activity site. Zhong Xinshe

Among them, the “Princess Hua” played by Zhu Guanzhang became the popular king of the day, triggering heated discussion.

“I feel that the teachers’ performance makes us a lot easier.” Lu Haoming, a senior three student of the school, said.

“The college entrance examination is an important exam in life. Students will be nervous before the college entrance examination. Anxiety, fear of bad exam, insomnia, irritability and bad temper are all caused by excessive tension. Some students will also have the idea of giving up the college entrance examination.” Zhu Guanzhang said that the activity planned by the school teachers for senior three students aims to release pressure for the students, “I hope the children can understand the good intentions of the teachers”.

In addition to role-playing and interactive games, each teacher took a letter from the examinee written to him last year and used the letter as the medium to let the students have a dialogue with themselves in the past, so as to relieve the pressure of the exam for the examinee who will take part in the college entrance examination in such a special way.

The picture shows the scene of the activity. The male teacher dressed as “Hua Fei” to relieve pressure for the college entrance examination students. Zhong Xinshe

It is understood that on the eve of the college entrance examination every year, the teachers of Nanning No. 4 middle school will create a relaxed atmosphere by organizing watching movies and distributing drinks and fruits, so as to relieve the pressure and cheer for the candidates. (end)
