title: Securing Discord
body:
Permissions and roles, the administrator needs to understand every permission and role in order to limit the attack vector and limit exposure. It’s about accountability, and taking responsibility for things we can control and understanding where we are vulnerable. Every discord we build should be built in mind with each and every single user being subject to compromise. Therefore, we have a PLAN in place BEFORE the attack, and do everything we can to mitigate and sometimes null the attack (before it takes place). But there is one role that must NEVER be compromised, and we can lock it down before the discord is open to the public.

## Discord Creator/Founder Role

![The discord creator/founder role is identified by the CROWN.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9pNu0CAI42af7dO2yqzFv.png?height=67&width=284)

The account that creates the discord should NEVER be an active USER in the server (once it is open) or even active anywhere outside of the server. It is OK if you use an active account to create the discord, but BEFORE going public, this role should be transferred to a burner account (preferably brand new account with email and discord name unassociated with the server/unrecognizable). This account is NOT used for anything else, other than being a ‘hardware wallet/ledger’ for the server. 
 

![This role can be transferred to ANYONE, but only by the user with the role. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/z-qwDiAGit7tqsl0bucQR.png?height=126&width=184)

 
 No matter what the permissions and roles are in a server, no matter the hierarchy of those roles, the **FOUNDER/CREATOR** account bypasses all restrictions and has absolute control over the entire server and every role within it. The good news is, we can completely eliminate this attack vector and keep it in cold storage, unmarked and hidden away on the server. This account doesn’t need any special roles or identifiable markings and we in fact recommend keeping it that way. 
  
 Users may be able to use tools to figure it out, or discord itself may do a poor job of hiding it, but we do NOT need to bring any extra attention to this role, nor do we need to put it at risk by using it on an active account. With the account taken out of play and not in use, there is no chance of anyone phishing or gaining access to this account. Furthermore if an Admin is compromised, we always have one role above it, hidden and ready to ‘break in case of emergency’ and regain control of the server/eradicate the threat. If this role is ever compromised in this way, we know the attack came from within and limit it to only the person who had access to it being responsible.

## Roles, Permissions, & Hierarchy

The next most vulnerable area of attack is ANYONE with administrator permissions in the server (humans and bots). Administrator permissions bypass ALL roles and restrictions within the discord and channels HOWEVER they still cannot change or alter the roles at or above them. This hierarchy of roles can be used to our advantage when structuring discord roles and permissions.

![Subject to change, missing verification bot.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F6xf2NACQwCapIOCRrmR6.png?height=674&width=677)

Understanding ADMIN access is vulnerable to attack, we place the ONLY human role with admin at the very TOP (+) role and we only grant it to few individuals who need it. I recommend 2-3 at max, depending on the size of the server. I furthermore recommend that those working in this position understand they are NOT allowed to use these accounts to degen into other servers or operate on them for anything else other than doing their administrator work in the discords they are working on. It’s a lot of responsibility, it’s a job and should be treated as such. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TeYlyd392eMzpwYNbSLy-.png?height=246&width=218)

 
 Notice this role is neither hoisted, nor visible on the sidebar, nor is it colored and meant to stand out. The vanity roles which mark and signify Admin, Mod, and Team do NOT have Admin access and they are restricted only to the channels they need for their job.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_S9lbFudcm3_Jefh3uOHG.gif?height=442&width=536)

These roles have an identifiable color and mark, sometimes with emoji icons and hoisted above all other roles. We expect these roles to be targeted and plan for them to be compromised. Therefore we plan ahead of time to mitigate the damage anyone can do with these roles with this structure and limitation of perms. Again, the only true Admins of the server have the (+) role and no ONE can give them this role, except for the founder/creator role which is on ice and locked away. And those with this + role take on extra responsibility and limit their attack vectors and exposure. 
  
 After administrator permissions (which again bypasses all restrictions, except hierarchy of roles) the next biggest threat is who has access to INFORMATION channels, with the biggest targets being on #Announcements & #Official Links channels. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Jy5bYbeigGGeeMs8WA7bo.png?height=842&width=1013)

The standard setup takes away everyone’s ability to write in this channel except for the intended user/role which overrides the nulled send message permission. Again Administrators still have absolute access and bypass all restrictions.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ztSxAiQQQn49fEfMnAgYX.png?height=850&width=1006)

Therefore we NEVER grant anyone *permanent* control of these channels and limit their access with the (++) role. Only the true administrator (+) role has permanent access (as admin negates these restrictions) and only the (+) role can grant access.  
  
 It is therefore recommend that his exchange of power and communication for it be done (off and away from discord). Either through the use of text, whatsapp, or other platforms. This way even if a users discord account is compromised, the attackers do NOT have a means to ask for access to these permissions (other than discord channels and DMs, which we will NEVER use to ask for these permissions).  
  
 Now attackers need full use to an admins device (phone or computer) to entirely compromise them. These attackers are not doing this yet, but as we up our security they may which means we will need more security and practices outside of discord.

## Trusted Bots

After removing the attack vector from the Creator/Founder account, limiting attack vectors to only trusted admin (+) role, our last area of exposure are the bots we use and the permissions we grant them. For projects of larger scale, I highly recommend fully-custom built, in-house bots to limit exposure and responsibility. As much as we dislike Azuki’s founder, I do applaud their server for having no compromises as all their bots are custom built. They remain a high target and have completely avoided compromise, this is worth noting and paying attention to regardless of feelings towards Zagabond or their project. 
  
 Not everyone can afford this option, but for any project that is bringing in hundreds of thousands to millions of dollars, there is no excuse. The only other options are to completely remove all bots from the server (which takes away logs and much welcomed automation), or to have very limited bots in the server strictly permed for their roles, and having the structure setup in a way to prepare for their compromise.

![This build is currently missing a verification gate, I believe I'd place it here - but this is subject to change. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/44gE4YUgygYuvzZohaJEM.png?height=426&width=678)

As it currently stands I have WICK above all other bots, with the quarantine role above them, but below Wick. This way we can rely on Wick to quarantine and remove all threats (including any of these bots being compromised). The problem with this build is that we are putting A LOT of faith in wick not being compromised. However, Wick is a PAID service and built with security in mind. Even if a user granted themselves a permission in this server, they wouldn’t be able to access and change the wick dashboard settings unless the server owner gave them access (which again, this account is locked away on cold storage).  
  
 When a Mee6 employee was compromised, and they were able to bypass server settings and change permissions and roles, the one server with Wick operating as intended (PXN) was able to instantly & automatically remove any webhooks and posts in their announcement channel. This was because the user was NOT whitelisted to post on the backend/dashboard of Wick. Even though an admin was compromised, Wick still didn’t allow that admin to post. Again it still puts a lot of faith in Wick and if you operate a large-scale project, I recommend you make your own.

## In Conclusion

Server Creator/Founder should be kept on ice and taken out of play. Humans with Admin access and perms above all other roles should be very limited and ready to take full responsibility and accountability for their role. It should be a paid job and those in that position should understand how to properly build and manage a discord. 
  
 BOTs in the server should be very limited in permissions and channels for only their needed purpose and those that aren’t we should understand fully how much faith and trust we are granting in them (as much as an ADMIN) if they have administrator access. Depending on the size and scale of your business, understand what that means. 
  
 There are discords that have NEVER been compromised, or if compromised, had minimal damage (threats instantly eradicated). We should all understand why that was and open-source our security as much as possible to team up against these threats. Understand this does NOT replace a much needed job and position within this space as we can give someone the keys to a helicopter and they still cannot fly it, or the schematics to a building and not everyone can build it.

title: China's 2-3 defeat to Denmark in the soup cup will encounter the defending champion
body:
Li Shifeng

It was reported on May 12, Beijing time that in 2022, the group competition of Thomas Uber Cup ended in Thailand, and China ranked second in the group competition. In the match with Denmark, the Chinese team didn’t hold a 2-1 lead, lost two points in a row and lost 2-3. China will face defending champion Indonesia in the quarter finals.

China and Denmark won the first two rounds, and the two teams have locked their qualification in advance. In order to get the first place in the group, both sides did their best in this direct dialogue. In the first game, Lu Guangzu faced asselsen. Lu Guangzu didn’t hold the lead when he won the first game 21-17. Asselsen pulled two consecutive games 21-10 and 21-9. He reversed Lu Guangzu 2-1 and Denmark took the lead 1-0.

Liu Yuchen / Ou Jiyi tied for the Chinese team in the second game. They spent 39 minutes to beat astrup / Christiansen of Denmark 2-0 (21-16, 21-11), and the two teams drew 1. In the third game, Li Shifeng fought fiercely with Antonsen of Denmark for 1 hour and 21 minutes. Li Shifeng, who lost one game first, successfully rebounded. He reversed and won two consecutive games by 2-1 (15-21, 21-19 and 21-13), and the Chinese team successfully surpassed by 2-1.

He Jiting / Zhou Haodong didn’t play well in the second double duel in the fourth game. They lost two sets in a row 16-21 and 17-21 to Rasmussen / sojiade of Denmark, and the total score of the two sides was tied 2. In the decisive game, Weng Hongyang won the first game 21-16. Unfortunately, he did not resist the counterattack of witting Haas. The Danish veteran pulled two games 21-19 and 21-18, and won 2-1. Denmark narrowly defeated China 3-2.

Denmark won all three games and ranked first in the group, followed by China with 2-1. In other groups, Japan lost 2-3 to Malaysia, Indonesia narrowly beat South Korea 3-2, and Chinese Taipei beat India 3-2.

In the quarter finals, the Chinese team in the first half of the zone met the Indonesian team. Another game in the first half of the zone was Japan against Chinese Taipei. In the second half, Denmark played South Korea and Malaysia played India.

title: Meta will cooperate with AMD to develop RF chips into a list of designated equipment

title: Porsche apologizes urgently! Netizen roast: insincere
body:
Two months ago, Porsche was collectively defended by car owners because of the reduction. Some car owners complained that the Porsche they ordered was officially reduced for no reason. Originally, Porsche officials promised to temporarily reduce the vehicle to “manual steering column” due to insufficient chip supply, and then upgrade the “electric steering column” for car owners free of charge. However, the official changed its words that it would not upgrade for free. The million luxury cars were reduced and only 2300 yuan vouchers were provided to compensate.

On April 30, the Porsche News Center issued the announcement “a letter from Porsche China to car owners”. The statement said that the goods were out of stock due to the shortage of chips, and said that the vehicles sold could not be upgraded and replaced in the later stage, which was unacceptable to the car owners. In addition, on the microblog, several car owners changed their nicknames to “grab my electric steering wheel”, “warranty robbery, breach of contract, no electronic steering column, only pay coupons”, “Porsche reduced electric steering column” and so on.

Today, “Porsche’s apology letter was repeatedly roast by netizens” rushed to the hot search. A comment with more than 3000 likes said, “this incident reflects Porsche’s arrogance, disrespect for customers, disrespect for contracts, and support the affected owners to take legal measures to sue BAOSHIJIE for breach of contract”.

Compared with Hongqi H9, the wheelbase of the new car is increased by 200mm to 3260mm. At the same time, the new car has a more luxurious interior atmosphere and configuration. In addition, the new car will be equipped with a 3.0T V6 supercharged engine.

In terms of design, the front face of the new red flag H9 + is the same as that of the red flag H9. The straight waterfall forward air grille and surrounding water flow light bar highlight the atmospheric atmosphere. In terms of body color, the new car will not only have a monochrome body, but also adopt customized two-color body coating.

Compared with Hongqi H9, the interior atmosphere of the new Hongqi H9 + car is more luxurious and the materials are more exquisite. Users can choose ceiling embroidery patterns according to their preferences. At the same time, the door can be selected from plum blossom, white magnolia and landscape embroidery patterns. The rear of the new car is equipped with independent dual zone air conditioner, rear 220V power supply, electric adjustment of rear seat backrest / headrest, one button folding front passenger seat, rear seat ventilation / heating / massage, etc., showing the noble and enjoyable rear seat.

The new Hongqi H9 + will be equipped with a 3.0T V6 supercharged engine with a peak engine torque of 400 N · m and a 7-speed dual clutch transmission. For more information about the models of xinhongqi H9 +, please continue to pay attention to Sina motors.

title: Smelling tumor? Zhejiang University research results crack the root cause of glioma
body:
Beijing, Hangzhou, May 12 (Xie Panpan, Ke Yineng) how do tumors occur? It has always been a difficult problem for scientists. Zhejiang University has proved for the first time that there is a unique direct link between olfactory perception experience and glioma through a clear chain of evidence.

This achievement was published in the international top journal Nature on May 11, Beijing time. The first author of the paper is Chen Pengxiang, a doctoral student of the school of medicine of Zhejiang University, and the corresponding author is Liu Chong, a researcher of Liangzhu laboratory and a dual professor of the second College of Zhejiang University.

Gliomas with discoloration are the most common malignant primary intracranial tumors. The annual incidence rate is about 3-8 people /100000 people. The median survival time of patients is only 15 months from the discovery of disease to death. Patients need to receive multimodal treatment such as surgery, radiotherapy and chemotherapy, immunotherapy and so on. At present, it is believed that the etiology of glioma is caused by the interaction between congenital genetic high-risk factors and carcinogenic factors in the acquired environment. However, it has not been determined how environmental stimuli are associated with disease.

In more than ten years of research, Liu Chong has been thinking about what factors can induce glioma?

“The growth of tumor cells will communicate and transmit information with surrounding cells. Neurons are the basic functional unit of the brain and function through nerve discharge. Therefore, we focus on neuronal activity to explore whether it will affect the production of glioma.” Liu Chong introduced.

To uncover the relationship between environmental stimuli and glioma production, the first challenge is to build an experimental mouse model that can spontaneously produce glioma. Because the tumor is produced spontaneously rather than transplanted, it can really reflect the process of tumor formation in the brain.

Facing this challenge, Liu Chong’s laboratory took several years to build a reliable animal model to simulate the generation process of glioma in human brain. Through rigorous analysis, the team found that the tumor mainly spontaneously occurred in the synaptic bulb layer of the olfactory bulb, that is, the information exchange area of the first level neurons (olfactory sensory neurons) and the second level neurons (called monk hat / cluster cells) of the olfactory loop.

“Since the olfactory brain area is the prone site of gliomas, will the neuronal activity of the olfactory circuit affect the occurrence of gliomas?” This sudden “brain hole” has become the key of the whole research. Liu Chong’s team then further verified this conjecture.

Zhejiang University research team used cutting-edge chemical genetic interventions to accurately inhibit the activity of olfactory neurons in mice. The researchers found that after inhibiting the activity of olfactory sensory neurons, the tumor volume decreased significantly; After activating its activity, the tumor volume increased. The results showed that the excitatory activity of olfactory loop neurons was the root of glioma.

In order to verify the above conclusions, the team of Zhejiang University further blocked the unilateral olfactory input of mice through accurate physical blocking. After directly blocking the unilateral olfactory input of mice, the researchers found that the volume of tumors in the olfactory bulb of the blocked side brain decreased, which fully proved that olfactory stimulation can regulate the occurrence of gliomas.

“This study is the first to intervene in spontaneous glioma formation by physical means, and also verifies the role of olfactory neural circuit in glioma formation.” Liu Chong said.

After clarifying the olfactory neural circuit that induces glioma, the next step is to trace back to the source and find out what is the mechanism behind it?

Through in-depth analysis, Liu Chong’s team screened out that growth factor IGF-1 is a potentially important effector, and IGF-1 in the olfactory bulb is mainly expressed in the second-order neurons of the olfactory loop, monk cap / cluster cells. Based on the above findings, the researchers constructed a new mouse model, which can simultaneously simulate the occurrence of glioma and remove IGF-1 specifically derived from monk hat / cluster cells. The results showed that after knockout of IGF-1 in monk hat / cluster cells, the tumor volume decreased significantly. Subsequently, the team activated olfactory sensory neurons and blocked IGF-1 signaling pathway on this mouse tumor model, and found that the tumor promoting effect caused by olfactory activation was completely eliminated. It is clearly proved that olfactory activity mainly regulates the occurrence of glioma through IGF-1 signaling pathway.

Liu Chong said, “in the whole glioma occurrence loop, the monk hat / cluster cells in the olfactory loop are stimulated by olfaction to secrete growth factor IGF-1, which is equivalent to the growth signal sent by the radio wave transmitting tower. This signal is received by the growth factor receptor on the tumor cell, which is like the radio wave is received by the antenna, and then transmitted to the tumor cell to start the process of cell malignant transformation and proliferation.”

Over the years, based on the long-term cooperation with the neurosurgery department of the second hospital of Zhejiang University, Liu Chong laboratory has been paying attention to the research and development of the origin of nervous system tumor cells, tumor evolution mechanism and personalized treatment strategy. The publication of the latest results reveals that external sensation (olfactory stimulation) can directly affect the occurrence of glioma from a new perspective.

Liu Chong said that this achievement provides unlimited thinking space for the follow-up to further explore whether different sensory stimuli (such as vision, hearing, taste, touch, etc.), even emotional stress and abnormal neurological function related diseases will also affect the occurrence of tumors. The in-depth exploration based on this research can help people better understand the basic biological problem of the essence of tumorigenesis, and provide a new direction for the prevention, early intervention and treatment of glioma. (end)

title: Web3的灵魂离我们还有多远？DID赛道现状、展望与投资建议
body:
## 核心观点

1. 赛道重要性：去中心化身份（DID）是Web3的枢纽，是应用层发展的瓶颈
2. 项目分类：DID项目形态繁多，可大致划分为链下身份认证类、链上身份聚合类、链上信用评分类、链上行为认证类
3. 未来发展：DID处于早期探索阶段，需要解决三大问题 —— 产品形态问题、数字人与真人之争、隐私保护问题
4. 投资建议：不推荐短线投资；可考虑用风投思维，在熊市底部时买入看好项目的代币做长期持有，等待其未来的爆发

## 一、DID是当前Web3应用层发展的瓶颈

为什么我们需要一个**去中心化的身份（DID，Decentralized Identity）系统**?

用大白话讲，现在Web3中的交互都是基于钱包地址的，但是创建新地址的成本几乎可以忽略不计，也少有人会把自己绑定在一个地址上。这就导致了用户可以随时放弃一个地址所代表的“身份”，也可以零成本创建大量的地址“身份”，进而导致一系列问题。

对于此现象，V神及其合作伙伴近期也在长文《中心化社会：寻找Web3的灵魂》中进行了指出：**他们认为，Web3目前在应用层存在相当的局限性，而这种局限性源自当前Web3 缺乏代表“人类的身份以及社交关系”的原生组件。这导致许多应用在实现关键功能的时候，必须依赖于其原本想超越的中心化Web2架构，从而复制了后者的局限性，无法实现Web3闭环**。

典型的案例有：

1. 当前的DeFi由于无法构建地址与“真人”的联系，无法实现不少现实中常见的经济活动，比如抵押物不足的借贷。
2. DAO如果想实现（有代币门槛的）“一人一票”投票机制，往往得依赖web2的基础设施，如社交媒体个人资料，来对抗女巫攻击（用程序生成大量机器人模拟真人行为）。
3. Web3建设者在各个DAO建设中都做出了贡献，但这种贡献却无法直接与其链上的身份绑定，导致其在求职时可能依然需要走Web2的简历填写等流程。
4. 一些NFT项目声称自己是由某知名艺术家创作的，但这种创作无法在链上得到直接验证。用户只有通过Web2社交媒体联系艺术家来验证真伪，若无法联系或得不到及时澄清，容易上当受骗。

因此，Web3原生身份组件的构建，对于Web3的进一步繁荣发展是至关重要的。行业内一般称这类身份组件为去中心化身份（DID）。

## 二、DID的枢纽位置与应用场景

Amber Group，全球顶级的crypto金融服务商，于2021年11月勾勒了DID的生态系统，详见下图：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6jTUS1eIVJbuF1MJfmExt.png?height=1470&width=1430)

在这幅图中，DID位于Layer3，处于整个生态的枢纽位置。

在DID的上游，是Layer1-共识标准层和Layer2-基础设施：

* 共识标准层可以简单理解为对Web3身份表示的各种标准规范的制定，目前主要参与方是为W3C（万维网联盟）和DIF（去中心化身份基金会）
* 基础设施层中，最值得关注的是.bit、ENS等域名项目 —— 由于域名可以绑定地址、地址本身难以记忆，未来Web3世界中每个人的“姓名”很可能会以域名的形式进行展示。

在DID的下游，是众多依赖于DID的应用项目。个人认为，当前对DID最为迫切的三类应用项目，是不完全抵押借贷、DAO治理工具、Web3社交：

* 不完全抵押借贷曾是Defi中的一大探索方向，曾经也有Goldfinch等有一定影响力的项目，但它们并不成功，TVL接近归0；但是，如果有了身份约束、甚至链下真人的唯一性认证，用户就不得不考虑到违约所要付出的信用成本，这和真实世界借贷相类似。
* 在DAO治理投票、包括项目对早期用户贡献的衡量中，如何识别哪些用户为真人、哪些是机器人一直是一大难题。当DID成熟之后，DAO治理也将会走向新的高度。
* Web3原生的社交项目目前并没有非常成功的，其中的一个因素就是缺少现实真人在链上的实体映射：每个用户可能有多个地址，且地址之间的交易局限于金融行为而缺少社交行为。DID的出现将为Web3社交项目的发展提供新思路。

值得注意的是，由于DID目前的成熟形态尚不清晰，不少DID项目的分类在不同的地方也不一样，这个问题也将会在后文进行探讨。有时候一些本属于socialfi、defi类的赛道也会被归为DID赛道的项目，对此我们不必纠结。

下面，让我们来看看当前的DID项目是如何做出解决上述问题的尝试的。

## 三、DID项目的大致划分及其代表方案

上文提到，Web3中不同的应用场景都对DID提出了需求。对于不同需求的侧重，当前的DID项目可以大致划分为四类：链下身份认证类、链上身份聚合类、链上信用评分类、链上行为认证类。

### 3.1 链下身份认证

将链下的真人身份信息与链上地址绑定，是一个看似有吸引力的解决Web3身份问题的方案：

假设一个人毕业于斯坦福大学，曾在谷歌当工程师，在硅谷有两套房产。如果上述信息能够得到认证而与这个人持有的一个地址绑定，那么这些链下的荣誉和财产也将为他在链上的社交、借贷等各种活动提供加持 —— 比如他想认识斯坦福的校友，抑或是他希望进行一些抵押率相对较低的借贷。

然而，现阶段如果想要做信息层面的绑定验证，是相当困难的。这其中最关键的原因，在于这些链下行为无法在链上得到验证，从而使得其审核依赖于中心化机构。比如想实现一个简单的工作单位认证，都需要这些工作单位配合上链进行审核操作，考虑到当前Web3的大众普及率和上手门槛，这对于项目的推广是相当困难的；更进一步的，如果要做工作中的项目经历认证，更是为审查困难、串谋作弊提供了可能 —— 毕竟这些东西都不在链上。

因此，希望挑战链下信息验证的项目寥寥无几。在A16Z去年11月的文章中，提到Violet项目在做这方面的尝试，不过其官网仍没有其具体方案的展示。

既然如此，现在涉及到链下身份的DID项目，更多的侧重于“唯一真人身份绑定”。这还是有比较成熟的技术方案的，那就是视频人脸识别。

BrightID是真人身份验证的代表性项目，目前其已有超过5.7万名用户。用户需要预约zoom视频会议，通过人脸识别和验证官的复核来做BrightID的唯一身份认证；如果用户之前已经做过认证，就无法再创建新的账号，只能申请身份恢复。

![BrightID APP的主界面](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tfMryU5b5vi4aIqiypfsv.png?height=1926&width=3292)

![BrightID通过Zoom视频会议进行唯一性认证](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J-8sX-xRcUaJx6qGr2mBg.png?height=1922&width=3638)

BrightID的当前主要应用场景，来自部分项目方开展项目时的“一人一号”需求，如比如经过BrightID认证后才能领空投。目前Gitcoin、RabbitHole、Status 等多个项目都已经采用BrightID。

除了BrightID以外，Verite也是个值得关注的身份标准。它由UDSC的发行方Circle公司于5月10日推出，其中KYC是其身份验证的关键之一，具体KYC的形式和产品的设计有待项目方进一步披露。不过个人认为，视频人脸认证是比要提供护照、身份证等进一步真人隐私信息等KYC更合适的方案。

### 3.2 链上身份聚合

这类的DID项目并没有关注用户线下的情况，而是通过“数字身份”这一概念，来实现用户的链上信息的聚合管理，甚至进而成为用户在web3世界的入口。

这里面隐含着一个深层次的假设：Web3应用的服务对象应该是“数字人”而非真人，每位现实世界中的用户可以选择在Web3中构建多个数字身份。当然，每个人的时间精力总是有限的，因此这些数字身份总有主次、领域侧重之分，但这没有关系。如果用户要凭借一个成熟的数字身份做出违约、欺诈等行为，这意味着他可能会失去之前构建这个数字身份所做的一切努力。

Unipass是这类项目的代表之一，它做的事情正是链上身份的聚合管理：通过一个Unipass ID，用户可以绑定邮箱、多个ETH地址，并且还搭建了社交图谱（CyberConnect）、信息聚合平台（RSS3）等应用层协议。通过这种不断的聚合和对应用层的整合、屏蔽，之后Unipass甚至可能成为用户在Web3入口，变成用户在Web3的“One Pass”。

![Unipass APP主界面](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EMDIjmTqxg-pnPn5bUVkf.png?height=1952&width=3162)

可以看出，Unipass是一个野心很大的项目，它的终极目标其实是取代钱包在当前Web3的生态位 —— 但其方案必然会与钱包项目起冲突，不少应用项目恐怕也不希望被“协议化”而失去流量入口。从更高的视角来看，对Web3的入口的竞争无疑是相当激烈的，未来Metamask等钱包项目很可能也会朝着链上身份聚合这个方向发展。

> 关于Unipass的更多展望，可以参考Nervos Network对Unipass项目方的访谈：[A Conversation with UniPass: Your Free Web3 Account](https://medium.com/@nervosnetwork/a-conversation-with-unipass-your-free-web3-account-ce5ed52f73bc)

另一类值得关注的项目以Spruce为代表。Spruce想做的事情简单来说，就是构建一个跨平台、跨公链的身份认证系统。比如，用户可以基于 SpruceID 的认证插件使用以太坊账户，直接登录 discord，不用二次信息验证。

可以看出，Spruce的身份认证，更多体现在Web3公链地址与Web2各平台账号的互通与融合上。与Web2现有平台账号的绑定，对于一些已经在Web2中有一定成就和影响力的人而言，无疑是一个很不错身份增强方案 —— 例如一个几百万粉丝的Twitter大V，其去做借贷的时候很可能可以得到更优惠的抵押率和利率。

![流程图： oidc.login.xyz 服务器如何帮助Spruce进行身份验证](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jMZLq-VoQChQYCsnri0OS.png?height=1080&width=1920)

Spruce于2022年4月20日完成A轮3400万美元融资，由A16Z领投。由于Spruce的实现涉及到许多技术挑战，其应用目前尚未上线，不过项目方会在官方不时披露其开发进度。

### 3.3 链上信用评分

这类项目的初心非常直接 —— 拓展Defi借贷的场景，把现实世界中金融行业的信用机制在Web3中找到某种实现，以提高Defi的资源配置效率。

ARCx可以看做此类项目的一个代表。它于2022年5月13日完成新一轮融资，由 Dragonfly Capital、Scalar Capital 和 Ledger Prime 领投。

ARCx通过发行「DeFi Passport」，根据每个 DeFi Passport 持有者的信用分来量化其链上地址的信誉度。信用分将通过分析持有者的以太坊地址历史活动来确定，其范围设置为 0 到 999 分，该信用分确定了协议为用户提供的抵押率。对于信用分高的地址而言，DeFi Passport 能够提供有竞争力的借贷抵押。

![ARCx官网截图](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KrgqTjMZzL0ult0FkuoO9.png?height=1246&width=1360)

可以看出，相比于前两类DID项目，链上信用评分类项目更聚焦于用户的“数字金融身份”，使用的也多是用户的链上交易数据而非其社交行为数据，这使得其很难朝完整的DID项目发展。但鉴于金融活动在Web3当前的重要地位，信用评分类项目也将会是完整DID生态中不可或缺的一部分。

### 3.4 链上行为认证

如果说前三类项目都聚焦于对用户的身份状态作出静态的整理与评估，那么最后一类项目就显得比较特殊了 —— 它是对用户的身份状态作出动态的更新。这类项目的核心逻辑是，引导用户参与某些合作方要求的活动、行为，并对其颁发链上的认证。

显然的，这类项目本身并没有给用户一个DID，更多的是对用户现有DID的不断补充。这类项目在DID的生态中也占有很重要的地位 —— 毕竟某种意义上，是它们定义了什么是“
数字身份”的组成部分。

Project Galaxy是这个方向的明星项目，其代币于2022年5月4日在Binance上线。Project Galaxy也被称为“数据凭证网络”，这里的“凭证”，就是为行为认证的具体表达。

> 用户连接钱包后即可生成一张“银河身份证”，证件上会根据地址的历史行为，自动贴上「认证证书」，比如「Uniswap 交易员」、「OpenSea 交易员」等等。这些凭证如同现实世界的各种职业资格证一般，在某些特定场景会发挥价值。

Project Galaxy最大的应用场景，就是帮助项目方利用凭证数据来构建更好的产品和社区，成为连接项目方和用户的平台。比如项目方希望用户进行某种链上活动后才能获取空投资格，Project Galaxy就可以帮助项目方识别这种链上活动并颁发凭证，既方便项目方的空投管理，也赋予了用户更多的价值感。

![项目方把活动任务挂在Project Galaxy上](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ldyd9CJ4ijpBRRENhgYxJ.png?height=1588&width=2658)

另外一个值得介绍的项目是Rabbithole，它是“学习认证”类项目的代表。它希望游戏化思维，将每个去中心化应用分解为游戏任务，引导用户与区块链协议、去中心化应用进行交互，培育 DeFi 用户的使用习惯，同时用户的 Web3 操作和行为还将获得“认证”。从某种意义上，Rabbithole项目正在给未来的课程结业证书、甚至简历构建打下雏形。

![Rabbithole的技能学习](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ofhd4KyscsoUFy0MaV-qg.png?height=1332&width=2320)

## 4. 未来展望

通过上述的分析，可以看出目前DID的发展依然处于早期探索阶段，有不少关键的问题仍然需要Web3建设者们去探索。对于这些问题，个人观点如下：

**最关键的问题，是DID的产品形态之争**：DID会像Unipass那样，朝Web3的入口方向发展，与钱包赛道相融合？还是会作为承上启下的枢纽，提供对用户真人鉴定、信用评分等协议接口，服务于各种上层应用？还是还是短期内更偏向于和Web2各平台的融合，通过“与Web2共存”的方式来强化认证的可靠性和有效性？也许这三条道路会是相互交融的，甚至也许还可能有别的道路，这些目前都还没有答案。**个人倾向于认为它会发展成为Web3的入口 —— 毕竟在大众用户的心智中，总需要一个尽可能简单、全面的“入口”**。当前类似于Metamask的钱包在全面性上做的远远不够，而聚合类的DID或许是一个方案。Web1的门户网站、Web2的搜索引擎、移动互联网中微信使用时长的不断提升和小程序生态的繁荣，都印证了这一点。

**其次重要的问题，是关于“数字人”与“真人”之争**：Web3应用的服务方到底应该是链下的真人，还是链下真人在数字世界中创建的镜像？后者似乎更加符合Web3的理念初心，但从Web3的全球监管合规化和大众普及角度考虑，真人的验证或许将是难以避免的。个**人认为，未来不排除这两者有共存的可能：经过真人认证的账号将在Web3世界中享有更多的权利，但纯粹的数字人依然也会被接受**。

**另外衍生的问题，是关于隐私保护的问题**：随着各种认证、评分的增多，甚至是真人链下信息的绑定，总有一些信息用户是不希望暴露在链上、可被随时查看的。当然，用户也不会希望这些数据放在项目方的中心化数据库里，这样就失去Web3的意义了。如何保护用户的身份信息，仅让其在必要的时候披露给必要的对象，也是DID在技术实现中所要面临的问题。

综上所述，DID赛道依然处于混沌的“莽荒时代”，这也将会是各路冒险家大展身手的舞台。

## 5.投资建议

虽然不少DID赛道的项目已经公开发行了代币，但多数项目的币价最高点往往出现在2021年11-12月的时候，现在的币价相比于最高点都有非常大的回落，有兴趣的读者可以去具体做些搜寻。

为什么会出现这种情况？

从情绪面上来看，21年底的时候正值新一轮牛市，随着Roblox的上市和Sandbox、Decentralized Land项目币价的飙升，“元宇宙”“Web3”相关概念异常火热，DID作为Web3的枢纽，也引来了社区情绪的FOMO。而在5月的现在，随着BTC、美股的层层下跌，再加上LUNA崩盘事件的阴影，社区的情绪是极度恐慌的，对于这类发展

从项目基本面来看，DID本质上也属于偏基础设施的赛道。多数项目的代币难以构建很好的经济模型和应用场景，再加上其并不多的用户数、不高的增长速度，社区情绪过后引发币价下跌，也是一件可以理解的事情。

从行业基本面来看，DID虽然确实是Web3发展的一大瓶颈所在，但它并不是唯一的瓶颈 —— 基础设施的不完善、用户上手成本的高昂等，都是老生常谈的其它问题。现在Web3在应用层可以说是“超金融化”的，除了Defi借贷、NFT交易等个别与用户交易行为直接关联的赛道之外，多数依然处于探索期，而DID的发展毕竟是需要真实应用场景做支撑的。在应用层如此现状之下，多数DID项目的用户数据不佳，也是可以理解的。

因此，经过如上分析，**当下时点个人并不建议对DID项目采取短线投资的策略。毕竟短期内这些项目很难有高增长和大爆发，再加上整体市场依然在走熊，这些项目的币价很可能仍然存在下跌空间**。

**但从长期来看，Web3若要实现真正的井喷式发展，必须要有成熟的DID解决方案，一定会有项目成为赛道龙头。所以，不妨用风险投资的思维，在自己看好的项目足够便宜的时候买入并长期持有，期待其将来成为赛道头部，实现数十倍乃至数百倍的回报**。

title: An Introduction to zkSync
body:
[zkSync](https://zksync.io/) is a L2 blockchain that uses zkRollups to enable high throughput and low-gas transfers. This post is my understanding of zkSync and zkRollups. The following topics are discussed in this post:

* The blockchain trilemma and goal of layer 2 scaling solutions.
* A definition of zkSync, zkRollup, and zkSNARK.
* An explanation of how zkSync achieves high throughput, fast finality, and low-gas transfers.

This is written in May 2022. The accuracy of information in this post can change based on upgrades to zkSync or Ethereum.

## The Scalability Problem

Ethereum is a decentralized and secure blockchain, but it’s not scalable due to its low throughput of roughly [15 transactions per second](https://ethtps.info/Network/Ethereum). When the network gets busy, transaction speed slows down, resulting in a queue of transactions. During slow speeds, users participate in a bidding war, increasing their gas prices in an effort to jump the queue and get included in the next block. Ethereum miners change the order of transactions in favor of those with the highest priority fee. This creates a slow and expensive user experience.

The goal of scalability is to increase transaction throughput and speed of finality. The challenge is doing this without sacrificing decentralization or security. This challenge is known as the [blockchain trilemma](https://www.ledger.com/academy/what-is-the-blockchain-trilemma), the idea that blockchains can only achieve two out of the three properties with respect to decentralization, security, and scalability. In an attempt to solve the blockchain trilemma, upgrades to Ethereum aim to make the network more scalable and secure without sacrificing decentralization.

There are many [approaches](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/scaling/#scaling-overview) to scaling Ethereum, including on-chain solutions like sharding and off-chain solutions like plasma, state channels, rollups, and sidechains. Layer 2 (L2) is a category of scaling solutions that consists of smart contracts deployed on Layer 1 (L1) that are responsible for processing deposits, withdrawals, and verifying proofs, while computation and storage are performed off-chain. Unlike sidechains, L2 inherits the security of the L1 network. It is one of the most promising scaling solutions available today. There are currently three main L2 solutions: State Channels, Plasma, and Rollups.

## zkRollups, zkProofs, zk-SNARKs

A rollup is a type of L2 scaling solution that batches transactions off-chain and submits them to L1 as a single transaction. There are two types of rollups, Oprimistic Rollups and [Zero Knowledge Rollups (zkRollups)](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/scaling/zk-rollups/). In this post, I will only cover zkRollups, the scaling mechanism used by zkSync. zkRollups is a type of rollup that uses Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKP) to prove the validity of transactions in a rollup block (batch of transactions).

Zero Knowledge (ZK) refers to one party being able to prove to another that a particular set of information is true, without revealing what that information is, hence there is zero knowledge of the information but there is proof that it exists. [Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Argument of Knowledge (zk-SNARK)](https://z.cash/technology/zksnarks/) is a type of ZKP used by zkRollups. A zk-SNARK is generated for each rollup block which is then verified on-chain by the L1 contract. Each zk-SNARK includes a proof of the validity of every single transaction in a rollup block.

Processing transactions off-chain enables rollups to increase throughput. Computation executed off-chain does not affect the speed of the on-chain part of the transaction. Rollups use compression to reduce the size of on-chain data. By reducing the size of on-chain data, rollups not only increase finality speeds, but they reduce the cost of gas. Having less on-chain data saves processing power, time, and storage.

## The Contender

[zkSync](https://zksync.io/) is a L2 blockchain that uses zkRollups to enable high transaction throughput and low-gas transfers.

**High Transaction Throughput**

zkSync scales transaction throughput with speeds of [2000+ transactions per second](https://docs.zksync.io/zkevm/#basics). It achieves this by reducing the amount of on-chain transaction data, allowing for transactions to be processed more quickly and for more transactions to fit in a block. Only a cryptographic proof and the state delta (the change in the state of the L2 blockchain) are stored on-chain.

**Fast Finality**

Finality in a rollup block can be reached in as fast as 10 minutes. Transactions in zkSync reach finality as soon as a SNARK proof for a particular rollup block is posted and verified by the L1 smart contract. This is a significant advantage over Fraud Proofs, which require up to 7 days for a transaction to reach finality.

The off-chain confirmation for transactions on zkSync are [instant](https://docs.zksync.io/userdocs/tech.html#instant-confirmations), however, users still rely on the validator to include the transaction in a rollup block. In the future, zkSync validators will be required to add a [security bond](https://docs.zksync.io/userdocs/tech.html#instant-confirmations) to the network as an economic guarantee that they will include the transaction in a rollup block.

**Low Gas Fees**

As a result of using SNARK validity proofs and compressing on-chain data, zkSync is able to reduce gas costs by [up to 200x](https://docs.zksync.io/userdocs/tech.html#zk-rollup-architecture) compared to a L1 transaction. SNARKs allow zkSync to only store the SNARK itself and the state delta on-chain. Everything else is computed and stored off-chain, where operation costs are fractions of a cent per transaction. The data for every rollup block is published as a root hash in L1 calldata, the lowest-cost data location. By bundling thousands of transactions, users split the cost of a single L1 transaction, reducing gas costs even further.

**Gasless Meta-Transactions**

zkSync supports gasless meta-transactions, enabling users to pay gas fees in the token being transferred. Meta-transactions are transactions in which a relayer pays the gas fee in ether on behalf of the sender. Dapps on zkSync can choose to sponsor the fee or they can have validators accept ERC-20 tokens for gas fees. This abstracts gas from the UX because it no longer requires users to have an ether balance or adjust gas settings.

**Scalable Payments**

Given the low-gas transfers and high throughput of zkRollups, zkSync works as an exceptional solution for scalable payments. With transaction throughput equal to, if not greater than Visa, zkSync can be used as a payment solution for p2p, e-commerce, retail, and more. [zkCheckout](https://checkout.zksync.io/link) allows users to accept token payments on zkSync via payment links that function as payable invoices. Developers can use the [zkCheckout SDK](https://docs.zksync.io/api/sdk/checkout/tutorial.html#structure-of-the-tutorial) to implement payments via zkSync onto any website. zkCheckout has already been implemented into [Gitcoin Grants](https://gitcoin.co/blog/gitcoin-grants-round-8/) as a checkout option.

**Mainnet-Level Security**

Because zkSync is a L2 solution, it inherits the security and decentralization of Ethereum. Once the rollup block is verified and produced in L1, it is immutable. Users do not have to rely on 3rd parties or validators for the security of their funds. Validators are not able to corrupt the state of the L2 blockchain nor steal user funds. If zkSync validators stop cooperating and fail to include user transactions in a rollup block, users can use an emergency exit function to withdraw funds back to L1. There is no operational activity required on zkSync to keep the funds safe.

## Conclusion

Ethereum L2 scaling solutions are live and thriving with close to [$5 billion](https://l2beat.com/) in combined TVL. Currently, there are several implementations of an EVM-compatible Optimistic Rollup. zkRollups are getting there, with several projects working towards EVM-compatibility. The scaling and gas improvements brought forward by zkSync are a significant step towards mass crypto adoption.

Smart contract support will come at the release of [zkSync 2.0,](https://docs.zksync.io/zkevm/#general) an upgrade that will include an EVM-compatible zkRollup. It will enable existing Ethereum applications to seamlessly launch on zkSync as well as allow Solidity developers to building natively on L2. The uptick in banking on a fast, cheap, and secure L2 is near.

__

Feedback? Message me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/silecrypto). 
 Questions? Join the zkSync [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/px2aR7w).

title: Maserati announced a recall of some models due to tail lamp failure
body:
Recently, Maserati (China) Automobile Trading Co., Ltd. filed a recall plan with the State Administration of market supervision and administration in accordance with the requirements of the regulations on the administration of recall of defective automobile products and the measures for the implementation of the regulations on the administration of recall of defective automobile products. From now on, a total of 5 imported 2022 MC20 (configuration | inquiry) vehicles produced from December 21, 2021 to January 19, 2022 will be recalled.

The tail lamps of some vehicles within the scope of this recall may flicker intermittently under special electrical conditions (the voltage is close to the maximum). When the vehicle is braked, the brake light can not be clearly and timely observed by the rear vehicle and can not provide effective signal for the rear vehicle. In extreme cases, the vehicle may be rear ended and there are potential safety hazards.

Maserati (China) Automobile Trading Co., Ltd. will check the production batch of relevant vehicle tail lamps. If the production batch is in the list of defective products, the tail lamp assembly will be replaced free of charge to eliminate potential safety hazards.

Maserati (China) Automobile Trading Co., Ltd. will notify relevant users by registered letter. Users can call Maserati’s hotline at 400-688-5111 to get information about the recall. In addition, you can also log in to the website DPAC samr. gov.cn、www.recall. org. Cn, follow the wechat official account (samrdpac) to learn more information and reflect defect clues.

title: Taking multiple measures to "let trucks run" to smooth logistics and ensure the supply of key materials for people's livelihood
body:
CCTV news: the smooth operation of transportation and logistics is related to the supply of key livelihood materials such as people’s “vegetable basket” and “rice bag”, as well as the supply of important means of production such as energy and raw materials. On May 11, the relevant person in charge of the Ministry of transport responded to social hot issues such as how to ensure connectivity and people’s livelihood.

Let the truck run and let the logistics pass

In view of the problems encountered by many truck drivers during transportation due to the epidemic in recent times, the relevant person in charge of the Ministry of transport introduced that it has guided all localities to classify and accurately implement truck traffic guarantee measures, implement the requirements of “pick and go” and “closed-loop management”, and effectively ensure the smooth passage of freight vehicles.

Hanjinghua, deputy director of the transportation service department of the Ministry of transport: all localities are required to accurately implement traffic control according to the actual travel of freight vehicles and drivers and passengers, whether they are involved in epidemic diseases, etc., and shall not use the place of origin and registered residence as the conditions for restricting traffic. It is required to completely cancel the restrictions on the epidemic prevention access of freight vehicles from low-risk areas. For freight vehicles with drivers and passengers from low-risk areas, that is, the green communication travel card without  sign, all localities shall not restrict the access at will.

Make every effort to ensure smooth logistics in key areas

At present, the epidemic situation in the Yangtze River Delta is still grim. The Ministry of transport said that it should go all out to ensure smooth logistics in key areas. For enterprises included in the “white list” of the supply chain, priority transportation capacity support, priority loading and unloading, priority distribution and other services shall be taken.

Take multiple measures to smooth the “last mile” of urban distribution

In addition, in order to solve the “last mile” problem of urban material distribution, the Ministry of transport will guide all localities to unseal the closed postal express distribution centers, business outlets and express service stations in an orderly manner on the premise of meeting the epidemic prevention requirements and strictly implementing the epidemic prevention and control measures.

Han Jinghua, deputy director of the transportation service department of the Ministry of transport: focusing on the guarantee of operation and transfer, guide all localities to delimit the logistics distribution node network outside the sealing area as far as possible to ensure the orderly operation of the network; If the logistics distribution node is located outside the sealing area, control area and prevention area, it shall not be shut down without authorization; If it is really necessary to shut down the transfer of inter provincial and inter municipal production and living materials and mail express within the prevention area and control area, it shall be submitted to the provincial and municipal joint prevention and control mechanism for approval according to the procedures.

title: Securing Discord
body:
Permissions and roles, the administrator needs to understand every permission and role in order to limit the attack vector and limit exposure. It’s about accountability, and taking responsibility for things we can control and understanding where we are vulnerable. Every discord we build should be built in mind with each and every single user being subject to compromise. Therefore, we have a PLAN in place BEFORE the attack, and do everything we can to mitigate and sometimes null the attack (before it takes place). But there is one role that must NEVER be compromised, and we can lock it down before the discord is open to the public.

## Discord Creator/Founder Role

![The discord creator/founder role is identified by the CROWN.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9pNu0CAI42af7dO2yqzFv.png?height=67&width=284)

The account that creates the discord should NEVER be an active USER in the server (once it is open) or even active anywhere outside of the server. It is OK if you use an active account to create the discord, but BEFORE going public, this role should be transferred to a burner account (preferably brand new account with email and discord name unassociated with the server/unrecognizable). This account is NOT used for anything else, other than being a ‘hardware wallet/ledger’ for the server. 
 

![This role can be transferred to ANYONE, but only by the user with the role. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/z-qwDiAGit7tqsl0bucQR.png?height=126&width=184)

 
 No matter what the permissions and roles are in a server, no matter the hierarchy of those roles, the **FOUNDER/CREATOR** account bypasses all restrictions and has absolute control over the entire server and every role within it. The good news is, we can completely eliminate this attack vector and keep it in cold storage, unmarked and hidden away on the server. This account doesn’t need any special roles or identifiable markings and we in fact recommend keeping it that way. 
  
 Users may be able to use tools to figure it out, or discord itself may do a poor job of hiding it, but we do NOT need to bring any extra attention to this role, nor do we need to put it at risk by using it on an active account. With the account taken out of play and not in use, there is no chance of anyone phishing or gaining access to this account. Furthermore if an Admin is compromised, we always have one role above it, hidden and ready to ‘break in case of emergency’ and regain control of the server/eradicate the threat. If this role is ever compromised in this way, we know the attack came from within and limit it to only the person who had access to it being responsible.

## Roles, Permissions, & Hierarchy

The next most vulnerable area of attack is ANYONE with administrator permissions in the server (humans and bots). Administrator permissions bypass ALL roles and restrictions within the discord and channels HOWEVER they still cannot change or alter the roles at or above them. This hierarchy of roles can be used to our advantage when structuring discord roles and permissions.

![Subject to change, missing verification bot.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F6xf2NACQwCapIOCRrmR6.png?height=674&width=677)

Understanding ADMIN access is vulnerable to attack, we place the ONLY human role with admin at the very TOP (+) role and we only grant it to few individuals who need it. I recommend 2-3 at max, depending on the size of the server. I furthermore recommend that those working in this position understand they are NOT allowed to use these accounts to degen into other servers or operate on them for anything else other than doing their administrator work in the discords they are working on. It’s a lot of responsibility, it’s a job and should be treated as such. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TeYlyd392eMzpwYNbSLy-.png?height=246&width=218)

 
 Notice this role is neither hoisted, nor visible on the sidebar, nor is it colored and meant to stand out. The vanity roles which mark and signify Admin, Mod, and Team do NOT have Admin access and they are restricted only to the channels they need for their job.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_S9lbFudcm3_Jefh3uOHG.gif?height=442&width=536)

These roles have an identifiable color and mark, sometimes with emoji icons and hoisted above all other roles. We expect these roles to be targeted and plan for them to be compromised. Therefore we plan ahead of time to mitigate the damage anyone can do with these roles with this structure and limitation of perms. Again, the only true Admins of the server have the (+) role and no ONE can give them this role, except for the founder/creator role which is on ice and locked away. And those with this + role take on extra responsibility and limit their attack vectors and exposure. 
  
 After administrator permissions (which again bypasses all restrictions, except hierarchy of roles) the next biggest threat is who has access to INFORMATION channels, with the biggest targets being on #Announcements & #Official Links channels. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Jy5bYbeigGGeeMs8WA7bo.png?height=842&width=1013)

The standard setup takes away everyone’s ability to write in this channel except for the intended user/role which overrides the nulled send message permission. Again Administrators still have absolute access and bypass all restrictions.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ztSxAiQQQn49fEfMnAgYX.png?height=850&width=1006)

Therefore we NEVER grant anyone *permanent* control of these channels and limit their access with the (++) role. Only the true administrator (+) role has permanent access (as admin negates these restrictions) and only the (+) role can grant access.  
  
 It is therefore recommend that his exchange of power and communication for it be done (off and away from discord). Either through the use of text, whatsapp, or other platforms. This way even if a users discord account is compromised, the attackers do NOT have a means to ask for access to these permissions (other than discord channels and DMs, which we will NEVER use to ask for these permissions).  
  
 Now attackers need full use to an admins device (phone or computer) to entirely compromise them. These attackers are not doing this yet, but as we up our security they may which means we will need more security and practices outside of discord.

## Trusted Bots

After removing the attack vector from the Creator/Founder account, limiting attack vectors to only trusted admin (+) role, our last area of exposure are the bots we use and the permissions we grant them. For projects of larger scale, I highly recommend fully-custom built, in-house bots to limit exposure and responsibility. As much as we dislike Azuki’s founder, I do applaud their server for having no compromises as all their bots are custom built. They remain a high target and have completely avoided compromise, this is worth noting and paying attention to regardless of feelings towards Zagabond or their project. 
  
 Not everyone can afford this option, but for any project that is bringing in hundreds of thousands to millions of dollars, there is no excuse. The only other options are to completely remove all bots from the server (which takes away logs and much welcomed automation), or to have very limited bots in the server strictly permed for their roles, and having the structure setup in a way to prepare for their compromise.

![This build is currently missing a verification gate, I believe I'd place it here - but this is subject to change. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/44gE4YUgygYuvzZohaJEM.png?height=426&width=678)

As it currently stands I have WICK above all other bots, with the quarantine role above them, but below Wick. This way we can rely on Wick to quarantine and remove all threats (including any of these bots being compromised). The problem with this build is that we are putting A LOT of faith in wick not being compromised. However, Wick is a PAID service and built with security in mind. Even if a user granted themselves a permission in this server, they wouldn’t be able to access and change the wick dashboard settings unless the server owner gave them access (which again, this account is locked away on cold storage).  
  
 When a Mee6 employee was compromised, and they were able to bypass server settings and change permissions and roles, the one server with Wick operating as intended (PXN) was able to instantly & automatically remove any webhooks and posts in their announcement channel. This was because the user was NOT whitelisted to post on the backend/dashboard of Wick. Even though an admin was compromised, Wick still didn’t allow that admin to post. Again it still puts a lot of faith in Wick and if you operate a large-scale project, I recommend you make your own.

## In Conclusion

Server Creator/Founder should be kept on ice and taken out of play. Humans with Admin access and perms above all other roles should be very limited and ready to take full responsibility and accountability for their role. It should be a paid job and those in that position should understand how to properly build and manage a discord. 
  
 BOTs in the server should be very limited in permissions and channels for only their needed purpose and those that aren’t we should understand fully how much faith and trust we are granting in them (as much as an ADMIN) if they have administrator access. Depending on the size and scale of your business, understand what that means. 
  
 There are discords that have NEVER been compromised, or if compromised, had minimal damage (threats instantly eradicated). We should all understand why that was and open-source our security as much as possible to team up against these threats. Understand this does NOT replace a much needed job and position within this space as we can give someone the keys to a helicopter and they still cannot fly it, or the schematics to a building and not everyone can build it.

title: GM CEO said he would surpass Tesla by making cheaper models
body:
\[global network technology comprehensive report\] on May 7, according to foreign media reports, General Motors CEO Mary Bora said in an interview that general motors would replace Tesla as the world’s largest electric vehicle manufacturer by manufacturing cheaper electric vehicles

“GM is going all out. In five years, our electric vehicle sales in the United States will surpass other car companies, including Tesla.” Said Mary bora.

In order to achieve this goal, in addition to introducing high-end models, GM will also launch electric vehicles below 30000 US dollars (about 200000 yuan), and further obtain greater market share through the “high-end + cheap” parallel strategy.

Foreign media speculated that Mary Bora’s $30000 pure electric vehicle would be the upcoming Chevrolet Explorer EV and another undisclosed mysterious electric vehicle. At present, in the U.S. market, the cheapest electric vehicle of GM is the bolt EV, with a starting price of $31500 (about RMB 210000), and the Tesla entry-level model 3 (configuration | inquiry) is $469900 (about RMB 310000).

title: Zero run C01 pre-sale endurance of more than 700km / world's first CTC Technology
body:
Recently, Zero run C01 officially opened the pre-sale, and launched five configurations with a pre-sale price of 180000-27000 yuan. As a brand-new medium and large car of Zero run brand, C01 is more than 5 meters long and has a wheelbase of more than 3 meters. The new car has become the first mass-produced car equipped with CTC battery technology, with a 100 kilometer acceleration of 3 seconds and a comprehensive range of more than 700km.

In terms of appearance, the design of the new car still adopts the family design style. The LED daytime running lights run through the central grid to the LED headlights on both sides. The headlights contain 48 crystals and are matched with hidden door handles + frameless doors. This simplified design style is also in line with the current aesthetic trend.

The new car adopts the sliding back design style. It is reported that the wind resistance coefficient is only 0.226 CD.

In terms of interior decoration, the new car continues to be equipped with the previous family design, and three displays run through the whole center console, creating a good scientific and technological atmosphere. In front of the driver, two brand-new steering wheels and wide gear shift are provided. In terms of intelligent driving, Zero run C01 has 28 intelligent driving sensing hardware, which can support 22 intelligent driving assistance functions.

In addition, the car is also equipped with the rear boss key, which can control the front and rear movement and angle adjustment of the rear seat with one key.

In terms of power, Zero run C01 is equipped with 400KW double oil-cooled motor. The most eye-catching scientific and technological equipment is the world’s first mass-produced CTC technology. It cancels the battery pack and directly puts the 90kwh battery pack into the chassis, which not only enhances the safety performance, but also improves the endurance mileage, with the maximum endurance of 717 kilometers.

In addition to the 717km range version, the new car will have 500km, 606km and 630km, with a total of four different range versions. Among them, the 630km version is a dual motor 4WD model, and the acceleration of 100km is only 3.66 seconds.

title: Ministry of natural resources: building an authoritative and efficient national emergency surveying and mapping guarantee system
body:
Today (May 12) is China’s 14th National Day for disaster prevention and reduction. In order to effectively respond to major emergencies and maintain the safety of people’s lives and property, the Ministry of natural resources issued the emergency surveying and mapping guarantee plan, which requires to improve the emergency surveying and mapping guarantee system and build an authoritative and efficient national emergency surveying and mapping guarantee business system and technical system.

The Ministry of natural resources defines the scope of emergency surveying and mapping support, including natural resources investigation and monitoring, development and utilization, ecological environment protection and restoration, supervision of the implementation of land and space planning, supervision and law enforcement, as well as key natural resources management businesses such as geological survey, geological survey, surveying and mapping operation and marine scientific research.

In terms of emergency response, the emergency surveying and mapping support plan has established an emergency surveying and mapping response level with clear responsibilities, overall linkage, coordination and efficiency and participation of all parties, and set three surveying and mapping geographic information support emergency response levels I, II and III.

In terms of information management, the emergency surveying and mapping guarantee plan proposes to actively adapt to the development trend of modern surveying and mapping geographic information and information technology, and constantly strengthen the integration of existing and new technologies; Build and improve unified, standardized and efficient emergency surveying and mapping support command and dispatching platform, emergency site survey system, aviation emergency surveying and mapping system, emergency surveying and mapping geographic information resource sharing system and other information platforms.

title: Don't step on thunder when buying a car
body:
Recently, China Insurance Research Institute c-iasi announced the collision test results of seven models: Buick GL8, Tesla Model y, Citroen Tianyi C5, Buick oncoway s, Toyota c-hr, tank 300 and xinxinjun. There are many popular models in the subdivided fields. Today, combined with the test results released this time, assuming that one of them is just covered in your car purchase plan, how to choose?

1、 Buick GL8

Official selling price: 2329-533900 yuan

Model overview: Buick GL8 probably didn’t expect that this unique Chinese model can firmly rank first in the current Chinese MPV market (don’t compare Wuling and Chang’an with it, which are not pure MPV models). Some people say that it benefits from its fashionable design and accurate grasp of the Chinese market. These points are true, but if Buick GL8 talks about money and generation, its history is far less than that of Odyssey and Senna.

Success is not unreasonable. Friends who have taken Buick GL8 know that its loading capacity is still very strong. It can be said that it perfectly deduces the space performance of an MPV. In the most worrying third row space, GL8 can also be easily handled. When used, the trunk space can still accommodate three boarding boxes of about 20 inches. Because of its strong space performance, GL8 has today’s position in the market.

However, only space is obviously not enough. In recent years, Buick GL8 began to make a big fuss at the luxury level, and the car series is also divided into ordinary version and luxury Avenir Avia version. The whole system is equipped with 2.0T engine. In this way, Buick GL8 has maintained a good sales volume with complete lining and face. Looking at all the competitors, even if the powers are around, it will stand firm.

In terms of safety, Buick GL8 also participated in the crash test of China Insurance Research Institute before, but its performance was not ideal in the earlier test. There was also a bending of A-pillar. This collision is the medium-term modified model of GL8. From the test results, it can be seen that the medium-term modified GL8 has a commission in all aspects of safety performance, especially in the 25% offset collision, from the previous P (poor) to a (good), The roof strength has also been improved from a (good) to G (excellent).

After the mid-term modification of GL8, the A-pillar was slightly deformed in the 25% offset collision, which was much better than that of the old model. The GL8 in the side impact has also lost serious points before, and has also been improved on the new models. On the whole, although the overall performance of the medium-term modified GL8 has not reached the optimal state, considering the adverse factors in its MPV structure, the progress in security of the medium-term modified GL8 is still worthy of recognition. However, it can be further strengthened in terms of body materials.

2、 Buick oncoway

Official selling price: 209900-309900 yuan

If you were asked to buy an SUV within the price range of 200000 yuan, would you include Buick ankovi in the alternative list? It is estimated that many consumers are unlikely to choose it. In this price range, there are countless domestic SUVs, which have made great efforts in terms of space, power and configuration. But the test still needs to be tested. Whether it sells well or not is put aside. First of all, the car must be OK.

Similarly, playing back the old Buick oncoway model, there was no small controversy in the first phase of the test of China Insurance Research Institute, because oncoway is a model produced in China and then sold back to the U.S. market. It can be said that the Chinese Standard Version of the old oncoway and the returned models have achieved very different results in the test of China Insurance Research Institute and the IIHS crash test in the United States. Especially in the rigid performance of the roof, there are great differences between the two. The medium gauge version is very “straddling”.

Up to now, China Insurance Research Institute has tested Buick ankway s model again. We see that it has achieved g excellence in the passenger safety index in the vehicle, 25% offset collision on the driver’s side is also g excellence, and the roof strength and side collision are also g excellence. Similarly, the pedestrian safety index and pedestrian protection outside the vehicle are also excellent. “Don’t steam steamed bread, fight for breath”. This time, Buick ankoway finally found a trace of face.

However, in terms of crashworthiness and maintenance economy, ankoway received a poor evaluation of P. Get m general evaluation on vehicle auxiliary safety. In that sentence, combined with its price, in terms of safety assistance, leonkovic’s performance is far from reaching the standard of domestic cars of the same level.

But anyway, a strong body should come first. This is the foundation, but at the same time, we can’t ignore the balanced performance of some safety auxiliary configurations. We hope that oncoway will continue to maintain excellent achievements in future collisions and see more progress at the same time.

3、 Citroen Tianyi C5 Aircross

Official selling price: RMB 159700-229700

Looking at the selling price of Citroen Tianyi C5 Aircross, it will undoubtedly be more people-friendly and grounded. From the side, it also truly reflects the dilemma of Citroen models in the domestic market. In fact, in this test, I would like to see the performance of Versailles c5x, but this time, China Insurance and Research Institute chose Citroen Tianyi C5 Aircross as the player, which is also worthy of attention.

But unexpectedly, the Citroen C5 Aircross Tianyi, as the representative of the legal system car, did not achieve excellent results. Look at its test results:

Firstly, in the 25% offset collision, it is a (good), and the A-pillar has a certain bending; To tell you the truth, it’s a little out of line with the consistent performance of legal cars. It’s very unexpected. Second, the front side air curtain of the vehicle is not large enough, and the score of side impact is a. the air curtain blocks the dummy’s head between the air curtain and the window. If there is a traffic accident, it will be extremely dangerous. I don’t know whether it is a design problem or a sudden case.

Third, in the roof strength test, the peak load of Citroen Tianyi was only 53954 n, which did not meet the excellent standard of four times the vehicle weight.

title: Top 5 cryptocurrencies to watch this week: BTC, BNB, XMR, ETC, MANA
body:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average has declined for eight consecutive weeks, the first such losing streak [since](https://www.cnbc.com/2022/05/19/stock-market-futures-open-to-close-news.html) 1923. On May 20, the S\&P 500 briefly fell into bear market territory, indicating that traders continue to sell risky assets in fear of a recession. 

Due to its tight correlation with US equities markets, Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) has remained under pressure for many weeks. The bulls are attempting to push Bitcoin [higher during the weekend](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bitcoin-targets-record-8th-weekly-red-candle-while-btc-price-limits-weekend-losses) and avert an even longer losing streak.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/f002ea05-8f8a-4299-9a96-07d8c679310c.png)

*Crypto market data daily view. Source:** *[*Coin360*](https://coin360.com/)

Bitcoin’s performance in the first five months has been the worst since 2018, indicating that sellers are in control. However, after several weeks of weakness, the crypto markets may be on the cusp of a [bear market rally](https://cointelegraph.com/trading-for-beginners/bull-vs-bear-crypto-market-what-is-the-difference-and-how-to-handle-both).

What are the critical levels that may signal the start of a sustained recovery? Let’s study the charts of the top-5 cryptocurrencies that may outperform in the near term.

## BTC/USDT

Bitcoin rebounded off the crucial support at $28,630 on May 20, indicating strong buying near this level. The bulls are attempting to push the price above the downtrend line, which could be the first indication that the selling pressure may be reducing.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/34a8a16e-b22f-4cbc-8cb4-38f836814546.png)

*BTC/USDT daily chart. Source: TradingView*

Above the downtrend line, the BTC/USDT pair could rise to the 20-day exponential moving average ($31,887). The bears are likely to defend this level with vigor. If the price turns down from the 20-day EMA, the bears will once again try to sink the pair below $28,630.

If they manage to do that, the pair could drop to $26,700. This is an important level to keep an eye on because a break and close below it could open the doors for a decline to $25,000 and then to $21,800.

Conversely, if buyers thrust the price above the 20-day EMA, the pair could attempt a rally to the 61.8% Fibonacci retracement level at $34,823. If this level is scaled, the pair could climb to the 50-day simple moving average ($37,289).

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/798c16b5-94df-4242-92eb-b33b10b4ff5f.png)

*BTC/USDT 4-hour chart. Source: TradingView*

The 4-hour chart shows that the price is getting squeezed between the downtrend line and $28,630. The 20-EMA and the 50-SMA have flattened out and the relative strength index (RSI) is just above the midpoint suggesting a balance between supply and demand.

This balance could tilt in favor of buyers if they push and sustain the price above the downtrend line. If that happens, the pair could start its northward march toward the 200-SMA.

On the contrary, if the price turns down from the current level, the bears will attempt to sink the pair below $28,630 and gain the upper hand.

## BNB/USDT

Binance Coin ([BNB](https://cointelegraph.com/binance-coin-price-index)) recovered sharply from the critical support at $211 and has reached the overhead resistance at the 20-day EMA ($323). This is an important level for the bears to defend because a break and close above it could indicate that a bottom may be in place.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/4076e671-1621-4b7c-a706-e682aee9fa2a.png)

*BNB/USDT daily chart. Source: TradingView*

Above the 20-day EMA, the BNB/USDT pair could rally to $350 and thereafter to the 50-day SMA ($376). This level could again act as a stiff hurdle but if bulls thrust the price above it, the pair could rally to the 200-day SMA ($451).

Contrary to this assumption, if the price turns down sharply from the 20-day EMA, it will suggest that bears have not yet given up and they continue to sell at higher levels. The pair could then drop toward $211. If the price rebounds off this level, the pair may consolidate between $211 and $320 for a few days.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/906f29e8-764e-4bb6-a2ec-c4f378bc2d82.png)

*BNB/USDT 4-hour chart. Source: TradingView*

The bulls are attempting to push the price above the overhead resistance at $320. If they succeed, the pair could rally toward $350. The bears are likely to defend this level aggressively. If the price turns down from $350, the pair could again drop to $320.

If the price rebounds off this level, the pair could remain range-bound between $320 and $350 for some time. The bullish momentum could pick up above the 200-SMA and the pair may rally to $380 and later to $400.

Conversely, if the price turns down from the current level, the pair could drop to $286 and then to $272.

## XMR/USDT

Monero ([XMR](https://cointelegraph.com/xmr-price-index)) dropped below the strong support at $134 on May 12 but the bears could not sustain the lower levels. This suggests aggressive buying on dips. The price has recovered sharply to the 20-day EMA ($179).

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/6dba6f2d-b1fe-4306-9171-14fd2f2e9ee8.png)

*XMR/USDT daily chart. Source: TradingView*

If bulls push and sustain the price above the 20-day EMA, the XMR/USDT pair could rise to the overhead resistance zone between the 200-day SMA ($202) and the 50-day SMA ($212). The bears are expected to mount a strong defense in this zone

If the price turns down from this zone but bulls arrest the subsequent decline at the 20-day EMA, it will suggest a potential change in trend. Conversely, if the price turns down from the current level, the bears will try to pull the pair to $150 and thereafter to $134.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/340282a0-9fc4-49d5-ac55-4b488db574fd.png)

*XMR/USDT 4-hour chart. Source: TradingView*

The 4-hour chart shows the formation of higher lows and higher highs. The bears tried to pull the price below the 50-SMA but the bulls defended the level successfully. This suggests a change in sentiment from selling on rallies to buying on dips.

The pair could next rally to the 200-SMA where the bears may offer a strong resistance. If bulls overcome this barrier, the pair could rally to $225. Contrary to this assumption, if the price turns down and breaks below the 50-SMA, the pair could slide to $150. A break below this level could challenge the strong support at $134

***Related: ***[***Dollar Cost Averaging or Lump-sum: Which Bitcoin strategy works best regardless of price?***](https://cointelegraph.com/news/dollar-cost-averaging-or-lump-sum-which-bitcoin-strategy-works-best-regardless-of-price)

## ETC/USDT

Ethereum Classic ([ETC](https://cointelegraph.com/etc-price-index)) dropped sharply from $52 on March 29 to $16 on May 12. The bulls are attempting to start a recovery which could face resistance at the 20-day EMA ($23).

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/32c98e11-9f55-4eb6-b5c9-a3c6eaa16ba7.png)

*ETC/USDT daily chart. Source: TradingView*

If the price turns down from the 20-day EMA, the bears will again attempt to resume the downtrend by pulling the ETC/USDT pair below the critical support at $16.

On the contrary, if buyers propel the price above the 20-day EMA, it will suggest the start of a stronger relief rally. The positive divergence on the RSI also points to the possibility of a recovery in the near term. The pair could then rise to the 38.2% Fibonacci retracement level at $30 where the bears may mount a strong resistance.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/f6fa1659-b1ab-46f2-bc14-55847d27df20.png)

*ETC/USDT 4-hour chart. Source: TradingView*

The price has been trading between $19 and $23 for some time. This suggests that the bulls are attempting to form a higher low but the bears continue to pose a strong challenge at higher levels. The flattening 20-EMA and 50-SMA do not give a clear advantage either to bulls or bears.

If buyers drive the price above $23, it will suggest the start of a new up-move. The pair could first rally to the 200-SMA and then to $33. Alternatively, if the price turns down and plummets below $19, the bears will gain the upper hand. They will then attempt to sink the pair to $16.

## MANA/USDT

Decentraland ([MANA](https://cointelegraph.com/decentraland-mana-price-index)) turned down from the 20-day EMA ($1.24) on May 16 but a positive sign is that the bulls did not allow the price to sustain below the psychological level at $1.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/db6b8c8e-8bbc-4267-b833-943bcfd84daf.png)

*MANA/USDT daily chart. Source: TradingView*

The buyers will once again attempt to push the price above the 20-day EMA. If they succeed, the MANA/USDT pair could rally to the 50-day SMA ($1.72). The bears may again mount a stiff resistance at this level but if bulls clear this hurdle, the pair could start its northward march toward the 200-day SMA ($2.72).

Contrary to this assumption, if the price slips below $1, the bears will try to sink the pair to the crucial support at $0.60. A break and close below this level could start the next leg of the downtrend.

![](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/79919407-7477-4e50-8ae2-7e54ae3ded1c.png)

*MANA/USDT 4-hour chart. Source: TradingView*

The pair is stuck between $0.97 and $1.36, indicating that bulls are buying the dips below $1 and the bears are selling on rallies. The 20-EMA and the 50-SMA have flattened out, indicating that the consolidation may continue for some more time.

If buyers propel the price above the 50-SMA, the pair could rise to the resistance of the range at $1.36. The bullish momentum could pick up if buyers overcome this barrier. Conversely, the bears could gain the upper hand if the price turns down and plummets below the support at $0.97.

title: Growing Population
body:
The Industrial Revolution was a time of great change, and with that change came increased instability in the agricultural sector. The increased demand for food caused by industrialization led to higher food prices and increased migration from rural to urban areas. 

This in turn led to more competition for jobs, housing and land, and increased social and economic inequality. Agricultural instability is still a problem today, and it is important to understand its causes in order to find solutions. 

One way to do this is to increase food security, which can help to reduce the pressure on resources and reduce the need for people to migrate in search of food. Another way to address agricultural instability is to improve access to education and training.

Industrial farming came about as a necessity of the industrial revolution and solved many issues that humanity faced prior to its onset. With larger scale production, increased efficiency & perfected uniformity we are able mass consume food on an unimaginable global trade scale!

For example, the introduction of mono cropping has resulted in higher yields per acreage and has made it possible to grow a wider variety of crops in different climates. However, with this newfound perfection comes great responsibility. 

The industrialization of our food system has also created environmental problems on a massive scale. Industrial farming has caused an array of negative consequences including soil erosion and species loss. 

A recent study published in the journal Science has shown that the environmental costs of industrial agriculture are far greater than previously thought. The study's authors say that the negative effects of agriculture on the environment are "widespread and significant."

With the World's population continuing to grow, there is an ever-increasing need for efficient and sustainable methods of food production. 

Traditional farming practices are no longer enough to meet the demand. Farmers must embrace new technologies and innovations in order to stay afloat. This can be a daunting task, as they must keep up with the ever-changing landscape of agriculture. 

Vertical farming uses vertical growing systems to produce crops in a controlled environment year-round. This allows for optimal conditions for plant growth, and the use of hydroponic, aquaponic or aeroponic methods eliminates the need for soil. 

Additionally, vertical farming systems are often integrated with solar panels, providing a renewable source of energy for the system. 

By utilizing vertical growing technology and modular building methods, we can create sustainable food production systems that can provide for the ever-growing population.

However, it is crucial that they do so in order to feed the growing population. With efficient technology and smart management practices, farmers can continue to provide the world with the food it needs to thrive. 

With so many factors to consider, it is easy for farmers' input and output data-gathering efforts can become overwhelmed. 

However with efficient technology or smart management practices in place they need only focus on what's important: providing the world with healthy food we rely upon every day.
