title: Vertical Farming
body:
Vertical farming is a type of agriculture where crops are grown in vertically stacked layers in a controlled environment. Systems integration and controlled environments are used to make the most efficient use of space and resources.  

These methods are not only capable of producing large quantities of food, but also of doing so in a way that is gentle on the environment. As vertical farming becomes more widespread, it has the potential to transform the way we think about food production. 

One key advantage of vertical farming is that it is much more efficient than traditional farming methods. 

For example, vertical farms can use up to 95% less water than traditional farms, and they can be located near urban areas, which reduces transportation costs. In addition, vertical farms can be operated year-round, meaning that there is no need for seasonal breaks. 

As a result, vertical farming is a much more efficient way of producing food. In addition to being efficient, vertical farming is also sustainable. Because vertical farms use less water and land, they have a smaller environmental footprint than traditional farms.

In addition, Vertical farms can use recycled materials for things like walls and ceilings, further reducing their environmental impact. As more people become aware of the benefits of vertical farming, it is likely that this method of agriculture will become increasingly. 

It's no secret that the quality of our food has been declining in recent years. But what is the cause of this decline? One major factor is the way that our food is produced. 

In order to maximize profits, many farmers and food producers have turned to mass production methods that sacrifice quality for quantity. This has led to a diminished nutrient content in our fruits and vegetables. As a result, we are not getting the we need to stay healthy.

 The three most popular methods for growing plants without soil are aquaponics, hydroponics and aeroponics. All of these techniques can often result in bigger and healthier crops than traditional plant-growing methods that rely on topsoil rich with nutrients. 

But what if there was a way to combine the best of all worlds? That's where solar panels come in. Solar panels can be used to power hydroponic, aquaponic, and aeroponic systems, making them more efficient and effective. 

Not only that, but the system can also help to regulate temperature and humidity levels, providing the perfect environment for plant growth. 

By integrating the growing system, you can increase yields, reduce costs, and create a more sustainable and eco-friendly operation.

title: Yuan Shaohai, the eldest son of Peking Opera master yuan Shihai, died at the age of 77
body:
Yuan Shaohai, the eldest son of Beijing Opera master yuan Shihai, died

Yuan Shaohai, the eldest son of Beijing Opera master yuan Shihai, died

Yuan Shaohai, the son of Mr. Yuan Shihai, a famous Peking opera performing artist, died in Beijing at 18:28 on May 10, 2022 at the age of 77. Her daughter yuan Shanshan and her son-in-law Huang Rijun issued an obituary, saying that everything should be simplified.

Yuan Shaohai was born in Beijing in 1945. He is the eldest son of Beijing Opera master yuan Shihai. Before his death, he served as the art consultant of Zhongchuan national art and culture exchange center, the Deputy Secretary General of the Chinese Academy of calligraphy and painting, and the consultant of Beijing national quintessence art inheritance Promotion Association.

Hao Shouchen, a 10-year-old principal of Beijing Shaohai opera school, was deeply influenced by his father. At that time, he had a strong interest in Jingxing Facebook, and was guided and taught by his father. He mastered the skills of how to sketch Facebook on paper or face. In 1965, after graduation, Yuan Shaohai was assigned to Jinzhou Peking Opera Troupe to learn the classic Aria “red light” under the personal guidance of his father. Yuan Shaohai had many well-known masterpieces during his lifetime, including “a red light” and “a reply to the group of heroes meeting”.

Vivo Jia Jingdong said that vivo S15 series is not only the “king of selfie” in image, but also will be upgraded to “the king of portrait”. This mobile phone has customized Sony’s main camera at the bottom, with super anti shake of hummingbird, studio level portrait algorithm and night scene spot filter.

Not only that, vivo S15 series adopts elegant sky step cloud window design, which is still the outstanding hand feeling of being extremely thin and lightweight, the excellent color matching of splendid painting and the ultimate visual experience of origin OS.

Vivo S15 series sample

At present, vivo S15 series has obtained the network access license, and there are at least two models of S15 and S15 pro. Among them, S15 Pro adopts 120Hz high screen brushing, is equipped with MediaTek Tianji 8100 flagship processor, and supports 80W wired fast charging.

In addition to the flagship configuration, vivo S15 series will also be equipped with self-developed beauty algorithm, which includes functions such as brightening skin tone, textured skin, vitality beauty makeup, intelligent beauty and fine shaping facial features. It can carry out more comprehensive exclusive optimization for the five major areas of the face, and can optimize the beauty for different faces of different users based on AI technology.

The new machine will be officially released this month.

title: 1.5T four cylinder / 62 technology configurations Chevrolet chuangku RS opens pre-sale
body:
On May 7, Netcom learned from the official that the new Chevrolet chuangku RS was officially opened for pre-sale. The biggest highlight of the new car lies in its power. It is equipped with a new maximum power of 135kW, 1.5T four cylinder engine + CVT power combination. In addition, the new chuangku RS is also equipped with 62 technology configurations as standard.

From now on to May 31, you can enjoy the “open first for respect” gift bag by paying 599 yuan in advance. Including the first purchase gift: 0 head of state, and the monthly payment is as low as 1599 yuan; Upgrade gift: the car can be returned without worry after 3 years, and the car can be upgraded flexibly; Maintenance gift: 6 free maintenance within 3 years; Subsidy gift: purchase tax subsidy upon ordering; Membership gift: enjoy the U · Club Gold Card and get 30000 points; Surprise gift: during the pre-sale period, users who have successfully delivered the car will have the opportunity to win Disney VIP tickets.

The interior of the new car with logo, black grille and other sports logos will be used to enhance the sporty appearance of the new car. In addition, Chevrolet’s new chuangku RS also added orange paint and replaced with a new 17 INCH SILVER BLACK two-color rim, which looks younger and more exquisite.

In terms of interior decoration, the new chuangku RS adopts a new generation of Chevrolet sports digital technology cockpit, a suspended double 10.25 inch screen, a new hunting speed gear lever and other RS exclusive designs, which not only shows the sense of science and technology of the car, but also does not lack sports genes. In addition, in terms of interior materials, the new chuangku RS is covered with a large area of soft bag materials, and the details are optimized in an all-round way. In addition, with the rear seats down, the trunk volume can be extended to 1334l.

In terms of intelligent interconnection, chuangku RS is equipped with a new Xiaoxue OS intelligent car coupling system. Three finger sliding can synchronize the left and right screen navigation interface, baidu intelligent voice assistant can recognize easy to understand oral instructions, and the smart home control system can bind and connect tens of thousands of smart home devices, greatly improving the quality of life. In addition, the system also supports wireless Carplay connection and OTA remote online upgrade.

In terms of configuration, the new chuangku RS is equipped with autohold automatic parking, electronic handbrake, multifunctional steering wheel, intelligent LED headlights, front and rear USB interfaces and nano anti PM2 5. 62 practical scientific and technological configurations such as air conditioning filter element and ramp starting aid. In addition, the car is also equipped with medium and advanced configurations with high convenience and safety, such as keyless entry, one key start, automatic air conditioning, rain sensing wiper, automatic anti dazzle of interior rear-view mirror, collision mitigation braking, follow-up distance prompt, lane keeping assistance, etc.

In terms of power, the new chuangku RS is equipped with a new power combination of the eighth generation ECOTEC new 1.5T four cylinder direct injection turbocharged engine + CVT intelligent continuously variable transmission. Among them, the maximum power of the engine is 135kW, the maximum torque is 250N · m, and the acceleration time of 100km is 7.8 seconds.

title: Vertically Integrated Agriculture
body:
Vertically Integrated Agriculture is dedicated creating a technologies that combine vertical farming methods with other smart systems such as hydro, aqua and aeroponics creating a complete ecosystem in which nothing is wasted and everything works harmoniously.

This type of agriculture has many benefits, including reducing the need for pesticides, increasing crop yields, and improving food safety.

Vertically Integrated Agriculture produces food in a controlled environment, which is beneficial in areas where weather is a factor. In addition, we can help to reduce the carbon footprint of the food production process by using less land and water.

A decentralized food supply chain is one in which food production, processing, distribution, and consumer purchases are integrated and coordinated within a relatively short distance.

The decentralized food supply system is an alternative to the industrial food system, which is reliant on large-scale monocrop production, long-distance transport, and global trade.

A decentralized system is often more efficient and higher quality than an industrialized one. Modular technology can help small scale producers to grow more food and produce more food with less effort.

With patented protection over corporate influence and a dedication to the creative commons for we will scale the development our technology so producers can easily setup integrated solutions, products, and services to participate toward decentralization.

This will result in more people having access to fresh, healthy food. It will also reduce the environmental impact of the food system by minimizing transportation distances and energy use.

Over the last century, there have been significant advances in our understanding of plant genetics and how plants develop.

This has allowed us to create new plant varieties that are more resistant to disease and pests, and that can grow in a wider range of environmental conditions. However, much of this research has been focused on individual genes and on making small changes to the plant's DNA.

This approach has its limits, as it is difficult to predict how a plant will respond to a change in its environment. A more promising approach is to create controlled environments in which plants can be grown under specific conditions.

The study of plant development and evolution in a controlled setting, and to identify plant plant growth patterns and their best suited particular environment.

This systems approach also gives the opportunity to stabilize or amplify the existing conditions in a local environment, which can help to improve plant productivity in marginal areas.

Environmental sensors are becoming increasingly sophisticated, and their use is providing researchers with a greater understanding of plant development and evolution.

By tracking the environmental conditions under which plants grow, sensors can help to identify the plant varieties that are best suited for a particular environment.

In addition, sensors can be used to monitor the progress of plant growth, and to track the movement of pollen and other plant materials. This information can then be used to develop new methods of crop production, and to identify potential problems with existing crops.

As sensors become more affordable and easier to use, they are likely to play an increasingly important role in the study of plant development and evolution.

The vertical farm is a type of agricultural facility that produces crops in vertically stacked layers. Sensor systems integrated into the framework of the vertical farm offer potential to generate valuable data about plant development under controlled environmental conditions.

These sensor systems can measure factors such as temperature, humidity, light intensity, and carbon dioxide levels. Measuring environmental factors will likely play an increasingly important role in the study of plant development and evolution.

In addition, sensor data can be used to optimize growing conditions for specific crops, resulting in higher yields and better quality produce. The integrated sensor system have the potential to revolutionize agriculture by making it more efficient, productive, and sustainable.

A vertical farm is a type of agriculture where crops are grown in vertically stacked layers in a controlled environment.Vertical farms can be used to grow a variety of crops, including fruits, vegetables, and grains.

One major benefit of vertical farming is that it allows farmers to grow crops year-round, regardless of the weather outside. Additionally, because vertical farms are typically located in urban areas, they can help to reduce the amount of land needed for agriculture.

Vertical farms also use less water than traditional farms, and they can minimize the spread of pests and diseases. As a result, vertical farming is an increasingly popular option for those looking to produce food in a more sustainable way.

Integrated sensor systems offer the potential to generate valuable data about plant development by measuring a variety of environmental factors.

Sensors can measure light levels, soil moisture, and temperature. This data can be used to track the progress of a plant's growth, identify stressors that may be affecting its development, and predict future yield.

In addition, sensor systems can be used to monitor the health of a crop by detecting early signs of disease or pests. By providing detailed information about plant development, integrated sensor systems have the potential to revolutionize agriculture.

In order to optimize growing conditions for specific crops, it is necessary to collect data about the conditions under which the crop grows best.

This data can be collected through studies of the crop's natural habitat, experiments with different growing conditions, and surveys of farmers who have experience growing the crop. Once this data is collected, it can be analyzed to identify patterns and trends.

This analysis can then be used to develop models that predict how the crop will respond to different conditions. These models can be used to optimize the growing environment for the crop, thereby increasing yield and quality.

In order to ensure that the data is of high quality, it is important to use reliable sources and methods of collection and analysis. Using data and statistics to optimize growing conditions can be an effective way to increase crop yields and improve quality.

The vertical farm is a type of agriculture that is increasingly being adopted by farmers due to its many potential benefits.

One key advantage of the vertical farm is the integrated sensor system. This system monitors various parameters such as temperature, humidity, and light intensity. By doing so, it allows for greater control over the growing environment.

As a result, the plants can be grown more efficiently, with less water and fewer pesticides. In addition, the sensor system can also help to reduce food waste by alerting farmers when the produce is ready to harvest.

Overall, the integrated sensor system of the vertical farm offers a number of potential benefits that make it an attractive option for agricultural production.

While vertical growing technology and vertical farming offer a number of potential benefits, there are also a number of challenges that need to be addressed in order to realize these benefits. One challenge is the high initial investment cost.

Vertical farms require specialized equipment and infrastructure, which can be expensive. Additionally, vertical farms often require higher levels of energy and water consumption than traditional farming methods.

Using a specialized infrastructure we can find ways to build the tools required to scale outcomes of the innovation and technology in action. The current infrastructure is not equipped to handle the demand for these services.

The need for these specialized services has become more apparent as the use of technology in our everyday lives has increased. With the right tools in place, we can overcome these challenges and continue to innovate and improve the way we live and work.

As such, it is important to ensure that vertical farms are designed and operated in an efficient manner in order to minimize these costs. As vertical farming continues to grow in popularity, it is important to ensure that these farms are designed and operated in a way that minimizes costs.

One way to do this is by using efficient growing methods, such as hydroponics. In addition, it is important to use energy-efficient lighting and climate control systems.Another challenge is the lack of standards and regulations for vertical farming.

This lack of regulation can lead to a wide range of practices being used, which can make it difficult to compare the costs and benefits of different farms.

As vertical farms continue to grow in popularity, there is an increasing amount of public pressure on influencers to push for solutions that will lead to change in regulation.

This can often lead to a wide range of practices being used the key factors include the type of crops grown, the climatic conditions of the farm, the level of automation, and the size of the farm.

As vertical farming becomes more widespread, it is important to develop standards and regulations that will help to ensure that these farms are operated efficiently and in a way that minimizes costs.

As vertical farming is still a relatively new technology, there are no standardized methods or regulations governing its use.

This lack of standards can make it difficult for farmers to compare different types of vertical farms and choose the most appropriate option for their needs.

Finally, vertical farms can generate a significant efficiency, which needs to be properly managed and utilized to offer the potential benefits. Vertically Integrated Agriculture is here to meet the number of challenges that need to be addressed in order to realize these benefits.
